1.content:
You toss the wrench on your workbench, and rest on the stool. Finally, after months of work, your newest invention is finally complete. Within the confines of your two car garage, on the side with the broken door, rests a massive, metallic machine. In the center is a terminal, and on either side is a large metal pod, with a locking door, a bench inside and even simplified control panels for activation from within. In the center, beneath the terminal is a metal door which hides the machine's core, which can be removed to either disable the machine, or bring its powers on the go for a short time.

It's finally complete- You've created a body switching machine of your very own. Humans are no longer limited to one body in their lifetime. You can experience life from a variety of different shapes! At least... That's how it's intended to work. You haven't actually tested it on any humans yet.

You're exhausted. It's been a long night. As anxious as you are to test out your new machine, you need to get some rest. In the morning, you'll run a proper test, and then move the machine to a more secure location where no one will tamper with it. You're so tired that you forget to cover the machine with a tarp before you leave.

Who is the first person to get to the machine the next day?
1.title: The New Body Swap Adventures

choices: Someone else just jumped into the other pod!
11.content:
As excited as you are to test out the body switching machine, you're exhausted. It's been at least two nights since you actually slept and you have a little catching up to do. When you wake up, it's nearly four o'clock. You take a shower, get some food, and return to your laboratory to decide on the next step.

Panic sets in when you get to the garage and see that you left the machine uncovered last night. Everything seems relatively undisturbed, so you just hope no one messed with anything before you got here. It would be heartbreaking if your siblings screwed something up, or stole the first test run from you after all of your hard work. Even worse, what if Dad found the machine and decided to end your experiment before it began.

Dad's car was gone, though. You opened a pod, and sat on the bench, racking your brain to figure out who you could test the machine out on. Mom was home, and would probably love to help out. You could hear your sister upstairs. She always proved to be a valuable lab rat.

Speaking of lab rats, it would be very interesting to transplant your mind into an animal. You could switch with Jake, the family's dog. You're careful with this thought, though. If you become a dog, you'll lose opposable thumbs, motor skills and the ability to communicate with human beings. You can't count on Jake to switch back when you're ready.

Who will you switch with?
11.title: Luke

111.content:
You curse your stupidity. Using the pod of a body switching machine as a thinking chair was just begging for identity theft. According the the laws of the universe you reside in, sitting there inevitably meant you were going to be using it soon.

When the light drains from the pod. sensation returns to your limbs, or the limbs you now possessed, and you step forth into the sunlit garage. You don't have a mirror on hand, so you just glance down. This is definitely the body of a woman, but you're not sure who. You don't feel old, but you're wearing a long skirt and a very clearly, carefully chosen outfit. You see your body emerge from the other pod, and after quickly glancing over itself, crosses its arms and smiles at you. "Who are you?" you ask.

"That's so rude, Luke," says a voice from behind you. It's your brother, Kyle. Which means, the body you're inhabiting must be Robin, Kyle's girlfriend.

"Why did you switch with me, Robin?"

"Actually," your body says, "I'm not Robin. You left this thing right out in the open. We got to the machine way before you woke up. Props, Lu'. Good work." Your brother, in Robin's body, was the one who jumped in the other pod.

"Yeah, haha." Kyle's pranks never amused you. It pissed you off that he was always messing with your stuff. "Now hop back in, and let's get everyone right back where we belong."

Your brother's arms wrapped around your stomach from behind. You screamed eek, like a girl. "Come on, Luke, Robin said in your ear, as gently as she could with a man's voice, "You built a machine that can do this, and you're not the least bit adventurous? Come spend the day with us. You'll have fun!"
111.title: You & Robin (& Kyle)

choices: Continue on with the day as is
Switch back into your own body
Find someone in the mall to exchange bodies
1111.content:
"Okay. You're right. We can hang out like this for a while."

Robin lifts you up, and spins you around, making your skirt fly up, and then sets you back down. "Awesome. You're gonna' have a blast. Just... Don't forget your purse." Kyle and Robin snicker, and head for your brother's car. Robin's purse is on the ground, so you pick it up. You feel ridiculous carrying a purse, but it looks normal to the rest of the world. Plus you need something to carry the portable core of the machine. No pockets in the skirt, after all.

---

Just as you expected, Kyle spends the day mocking you. His impersonation of you is... probably more spot on than you'd ever admit. Robin's getting a good laugh, too. A socially awkward boy in the body of a well groomed woman is apparently a hilarious, and adorable, combination. She treats you like a girlfriend, and repeatedly forces you to act more girly, using the sanctity of her reputation as a guilt trip. While at the mall, she even forces you to try on clothes. Wearing a skirt down to your ankles no longer felt awkward after wearing bikinis, short shorts, mini skirts, prom dresses, and even a few Halloween costumes.

For a few minutes, Robin and Kyle enter the men's room together, leaving you with a moment to yourself. You regret coming with these two to the mall. If you were going to go for the girl experience, you at least wanted to have the freedom to experiment on your own without two hecklers aware of your true gender. Reaching into Robin's purse, you confirm that the machine core is still with you and functional.
1111.title: Luke Looks Like a Lady

11111.content:
Quickly realizing it would be bad if you swapped with anyone.
With one of the two with you, they would just swap back instantly.
And it would be a bad Idea to swap with anyone else because they would just give it away instantly.
You put the core back
What happens next
11111.title: Continue on with the day as is

111111.content: Of course more shopping is on their list and for a while it was fun you have to admit, but now it becomes more and more boring, even annoying to you. You start to become hungry and suggest to eat something…
111111.title: More shops

111112.content:
You turned around, only to suddenly feel someone’s lips on yours, tongue reaching in your mouth, as well as a hand on your ass. As the kiss is broken, you see your brother’s face. Robin, in Kyle’s body, just kissed you. “Wha-what the hell did you do that for?” You blushed in embarrassment at kissing someone with your brother’s face.

“Well, we ARE a couple aren’t we?” Robin said with Kyle’s voice.

“Well, your bodies are.” Kyle added, with an unreadable expression on your former face.

“Why don’t we go on a date, right now? It’ll be a unique experience for you.” Robin suggested.

“What? Why would I want to do that?” You asked.

“I have mixed feelings about this idea. I feel like my brother is stealing my girlfriend, but at the same time, it’s funny to think my brother’s going on a date with a guy, even if that guy is actually my girlfriend in my body.”

Don’t be silly, ‘bro’. She’s MY girlfriend, and has been from the start.” Robin smirked. “I’ll be sure to give you all the deets later.”

“I still haven’t agreed to anything.” You said loudly.

“You know you want to. You always love going on dates with me, ‘babe’.” Robin clearly was getting into her role as ‘Kyle’.

“Hell, why not? I’ll go do something nerdy or something. Might be fun.” Kyle, in your body, said. “Have fun, ‘Robin’.”

“Wha-.” Robin pulled you along, leading you to...
111112.title: something else

choices: You swap with one of the clerks
The mysterious person gets to you first
11113.content:
You casually slide around the corner, just as Kyle and Robin are emerging from the bathroom. "Where'd Lu' go?"

"Maybe he's in... The ladies room," Robin responds with a giggle. The sound of Kyle giggling is still unsettling.

"Maybe you should go in and check on him. Make sure he's not getting a little too personal in there."

"I can't go in the ladies' room, silly, besides. We've been giving him crap all day. If he wants a little peek, that's fine by me. He's earned it for putting up with us."

"Now, wait, wait, wait just a minute..."

You wander away as Kyle's jealousy takes hold of the conversation. You have a feeling a fight might be coming along. Maybe if they break up, Robin will date you instead. She's one cool chick. Make sure you don't hand her body over to some creep.

You pull out the device, which you modeled after an mp3 player, and place one of the earbuds in your ear. You just need to find someone to switch off with. Despite the teasing, you're starting to get comfortable in a female body. It wouldn't be bad at all if you could switch with another girl, and there were a few cute clerks you ran into while you were being dragged around.

But unbeknown to you, someone else is gunning for a cute girl, and they've set their eyes on you, and the second, unused earbud dangling around you.
11113.title: Cutie or Creepy?

111132.content:
You'd been too careless. While your brother and Robin were picking on you, you must have spoken of the body swap too loudly, because someone overheard you, and even worse, believed you. He was clever enough to figure out that the mp3 player you were using was the medium for the swap, too. As you approached a store, your stalker crept up behind you, grabbed the dangling earbud, and forcefully activated the bodyswap mechanism.

Caught entirely off guard, the electric shock of the portable core dazes you. You come to, to the image of 'Robin' adjusting you into one of the coin-operated massage chairs dotted around the mall. You don't immediate find it strange to see your brother's girlfriend walking away, but you soon realize that it's not your brother that just swapped with you. Someone just hijacked your body, and is taking off, with the portable core in tow! If you lose that, not even the two pods in your garage will work!

You go to get up, and you stumble to the ground.
111132.title: Bodyjacker

1111321.content:
You're out of breath, weak. Heavy. Using all of your might, you stumble toward the reflective glass of a nearby store, and see yourself for what you've become. An older man, in his 60's. The hair on top of your head is mostly gone, but what little remains on the sides is kind of combed over to cover the baldness. Your shirt is covered in sweat and food stains, and grosses you out just looking at it, but the worst part of it all is your size. You're gigantic. Somewhere between 400 and 500 pounds, and it shows. Your arms are flubber, and your gut reaches out far enough that you can't even see your legs. It's hard to breathe, let alone walk.

You see Robin, or at least her body, skipping along back in the direction you came from. You barrel in her direction, but you can't move fast enough. You try to yell, but the attempt to run exhausted you- you can't wheeze out a single word. Though your whole body is pain, you keep heading towards where you had left Kyle and Robin.

While trotting forward, you think you notice something on the ground, but it soon vanishes under your gut. Do you go back to check it out, or continue your mad rush toward the body thief?
1111321.title: Large and Unable to Charge

11113212.content:
You take a chance, and stop, turning around to see what you had seen, and your eyes gleam! It's the machine's portable device! It fell out of Robin's bag when the thief was skipping along. Bending over is tough, but you manage to get the device off of the floor and into your pudgy hands. Dealing with the ear buds and buttons is like brain surgery, but you manage to get ahold of them without breaking them.

You have the device back, so you can switch this blob back into his own skin, but you still will have trouble catching up. By the time you get this body to the other end of the mall, they might have gone into a store, or worse, gone home!

Though it would make you no better than this creep, you might be better off taking someone elses body so you can actually catch up with your body. You can always sort everything out after you get your own body back.
11113212.title: Lost and Found

choices: Wait for the man in the suit
111132121.content:
You hold the device for dear life, and plow down the halls of the mall, until you reach the food court. You peeked inside every store along the way, but couldn't see anything. You make another lap, and can't find your body. When you check the parking lot, your suspicions are confirmed, and you were right. They were long gone. You had to plan your next move, and started rifling through the belongings of your new body to find a clue to your identity... Only there were none to speak of. No wallet, no keys, no cell phone. No money, no car. Nothing at all. Just the disgusting face staring back at you in the restroom mirror. "What do I do? What do I do?" you say aloud to yourself. You have no resources, and your house is miles and miles away. You were in immense pain just from patrolling the mall a few times. You couldn't walk home like this.

You don't want to swap with any innocents, but maybe honesty is the best approach. You take the machine with you, and try to explain your situation to anyone who would hear you, looking for anyone who would help you, who might let you borrow their body long enough to set things right. Most people laugh and walk off. Some are creeped out, regardless of whether or not they believe you. One woman believed you, and told you to your face that she didn't trust you, and then called for security.

You only have time to plead with one more person, and there's only two choices here. There's a teenage boy, and an older man in a suit, who seems to be coming your way.
111132121.title: Don't involve any innocents

choices: "Actually, forget it. I'll get a different one."
1111321212.content:
"Are you the man, claiming to have a device that can switch brains?" You nod, and he smiles. "Come on. Show me, you and me. Right now."

You nervously hold up the machine. Instead of showing him you continue to tell the truth. "This is only a portable version of my real machine. I could switch us right now, but I'm afraid I only have enough power for one more swap. We would be stuck until I could recharge it."

"Why don't you just recharge it then?"

You shake your head, and wave your hands over your body. "This guy... He stole my body. He's probably at my house with the machine, pretending to be me right now. I don't have a car, or money or-"

"The stamina to walk home like that." The old man nods in approval and shakes your hand. "Alright. I believe everything you're telling me. Let's go. Everyone in has heard the story about the creepy giant with the body switching machine. Security will be here soon, we'll take my car."

---

"Alright, we're safe now," he says as you both drive off in his limozine. You have to sit on the floor, because you're too tall when you sit on the seat. Even then, you can't sit comfortably. "My name is Ronald Tramp. You may have heard of me. I have a lot of money, but money can't get you everything, my boy. What can I call you?"

"I'm Luke."

"Very well, Luke. I hope we can look forward to this being the start of a great friendship, and perhaps... Partnership."

You tell Tramp a little more about your background as a scientist and inventor, and he reveals to you his plan to monetize body swapping, a science his team had failed to produce. You tell him your address, as well as the times when your house would be empty, and the next day, your body swapping machine is sitting in your brand new office at Tramp Industries. You re-install the core of the machine, and you're back in business. You give Ronald the long awaited test run, and he gives you a great big hug, after switching back, of course.

" Excellent work, my boy. You're a real prodigy! Now let's get you out of that blob! I can arrange to have your body brought here."
1111321212.title: Ronald Tramp

11113212122.content:
"Actually, forget it. I'll get a different one instead."

Tramp gives you a light punch on the arm. "That's the spirit, my boy. I was actually hoping you would say that. Prodigy or not, Making a child my partner is a very sticky situation. Legally, and as far as others would see it. The press would have a field day, and I don't know that my employees would show you the respect you deserve."

You shrug. "I've spent a day in this body. I can understand why this guy was so desperate to get out. There's not much left for me in my old life anyways. You're right. It would just get in the way. Can you find me some people who may be willing to switch bodies with me?"

Ronald puts his hand on your shoulder, "I hope you're not upset, but I already took the liberty of it. People are far more willing to believe anything when you have the kind of money I do." He winked at you, and then paged his secretary to send in the first candidate.

The first person walked in, and it was a woman. You exchange a glance with your new boss, and he smirks, and whispers in your ear. "As a man, the first thing I'd want to switch with would be the other half. Am I wrong?"

She stands firmly in front of you, unamused by the comments. The woman is wearing a dress suit, with glasses, and has her hair up in a bun. Her black pantyhose seem to shine in the sunlight. She looks to be about 35, and is in excellent shape for her age. "My name is Clair Palmer. I just recently quit my job. I'm not married, I'm not close to my family, and I have few friends." She glares through her glasses at you. "I'm a clean slate, perfect for starting a brand new life."

"Why are you interested in switching bodies with me, Ms. Palmer? Money?"

She scoffs. "Though, I expect to be thoroughly compensated for taking on that body that you clearly have left to waste, it's sexist clowns like you that have driven me to despise my life as a woman. My sex does not mean a thing to me, yet I've been forced to endure sexism in the workplace, and on the streets. I have no interest in starting over as a woman. With hard work and proper care, even that body of yours can be raised to my qualifications."

Tramp leans to you. "She's feisty. I hope you'll make that face of hers a bit more... Agreeable, no? What do you say? Want to switch with her?
11113212122.title: First Candidate: Clair Palmer

choices: Curious about what's happening at your old home?
111132121221.content:
"Sure. Let's do it. When will you be ready, Clair?"

"Right now. Of course I made sure to tie up all of my loose ends before trading in my body. Didn't you?"

You really hope you don't take on any of this girl's attitude when you switch with her. She's insufferable. The two of you climb into the pods of the machine, and Mr. Tramp activates it, causing you to swap. For a moment, you think something went wrong, but that was just the sound of a little stress on the machine. That body was too much weight for it. The swap works perfectly.

When you stand up, you feel as if you could leap to the moon. You're so light, and physically fit. Though this is the body of a 35 year old woman, you feel like you're in the best shape out of all five of the lives you've experienced in the fast 24 hours. Even more than yourself or Robin! You throw a few punches in mid air, and impress yourself. She's strong, too!

You didn't realize just how large the bodysnatcher's body had been, because you had never seen it from the outside, but it loomed over you, now with Clair inside of it. "Certainly, you've never felt like that, given that you were always stuffing your face with fast food." Clair braces, and catches you off guard by slamming you with rolls of fat. You're knocked back, having no experience balancing on high heeled shoes and fall on your butt, breaking a heel in the process. "Try not to do to my... Never mind. Do whatever you want with your body, it's not mine anymore. Inflate like a balloon for all I care." Clair stomps across the office, looking over her monstrous new form. She actually seems kind of amused by it. "So who am I? What's my name?"

Ronald Tramp steps in, and takes over. "Muchas Gracias, Former Clair Palmer. Unfortunately, we don't know the identity of this body, so I'm taking the liberty of sculpting a new identity. I won't give you everything, but I'm providing you with an identity, a bank account loaded with ample funds to start over, a letter of recommendation that should get you any job you apply for, and..." Mr Tramp laughed a little, "A gym membership."

Clair nodded. "I suppose that's good enough compensation. Thank you very much, Mr. Tramp, Ms. Palmer." Ronald directed the former woman to her secretary, so the details of her, rather his, new identity could be ironed out, and she left the office, leaving just you and Ronald together.

"Well, Luke. How does if feel to have a brand new body?"

You had managed to stand back up, after ditching the shoes. You wiggle your toes in the stockings. "She took great care of her body. I don't know if I'm going to like being a woman, but for now I'm happy. I can always change later." Clair's voice sounded a little different coming from the inside, but you gave it a warmth that that cold woman never did. You almost sounded friendly! "What about you, Mr. Tramp?"

Ronald Tramp folds his hands behind his back, and walks over to the window. "It might be nice to get a younger body, but it's more important to me to keep my company going. If I switched with anyone, I'd lose my identity. It would be too suspicious if someone random suddenly gained control of my empire. I need to stay in this body, for now."

You nod. Makes sense, though you feel bad for him.

"You, however, can join my company without suspicion. By tomorrow, I'll have you in the system, and we can work on the paperwork. I'll arrange to have a laboratory set up for you to continue your work. In the mean time," Tramp extracts a credit card from his pocket. "Take this card, and go break in your new body. Clothes, food, whatever your heart desires. I'll see you for work in the morning."

Ronald Tramp leaves you with his credit card, the key and address to your new apartment, and about 24 hours until you were due back for work tomorrow.
111132121221.title: You & Clair Palmer

1111321212211.content:
Tramp's driver drops you off at the apartment complex, and you enter alone, bidding the driver a good day. When you get inside, you're not surprised by how clean and neat the previous tenant had left it. You expected even the furniture to be cold to touch. You leave your broken heels be the door, and slide along the carpet in your stockings. The living room and kitchen were connected, with only a small island separating them. Everything is clean, and the fridge and freezer are nearly empty. Which sucks, because you're kind of hungry.

You continue to look around, seeing a small bathroom without many noteworthy aspects, and the bedroom, which was as neat and tidy as the rest of the house. The last room was an office, and held the only surprising thing here- Her computer was pretty powerful! It was a gaming rig! Either she had inherited it from someone else, or Clair was a closet PC gamer! The hard drive has been wiped, though, so you can't confirm your suspicions. There were some documents and paperwork crucial to your new identity, but otherwise there were zero real personal items in the entire apartment. You wonder if she had disposed of them before handing her life off to you, or if she just didn't have any sentimental value for anything, period. Either way, she was right. Her life is a clean slate, free for you to build up as you please. It was an unusual feeling. Kind of like re-starting a video game after the fact. You don't even know where to start with your new life.

You go into the bedroom, and lie on the bed for a few minutes to soak it all in. A day ago, you were a monstrous fat man, running around a shopping mall like a psychopath. Hours before that, you had been a cute teenage girl, getting dragged around a mall by two boys. Before that, Luke, the scientist and inventor of a body swapping machine, which now rested in Ronald Tramp's office. You're a little uncomfortable with your creation outside of your control, but you think you can trust your new friend.

You get off the bed, and look over the dress suit you've been wearing. "Time to take this off, you think to yourself." You unzip the black skirt, and watch it drop to the floor. You see dark panties through the black stockings, which you peel off next, letting the cool air touch your legs for the first time. You unbutton the jacket, toss it on the floor, and then quickly unbutton the blouse, anticipating what was underneath. A black bra! You parade in front of the mirror in your undergarments, getting a laugh. If Clair saw what you were making her do, she would... Not care?

You're having a little trouble accepting that all of this is yours now. This is you. Hell, you should probably start calling yourself Clair, or maybe change your name, but something in the back of your heart makes you feel that you're still Luke, and that your body is still waiting at home, occupied by your brother.

You open the closet and gasp! The closet is filled with... Plain clothes! You sigh. So much for playing dress up. Although, you remember the card Tramp had given you free reign with. Time for a shopping spree.
1111321212211.title: Your New Digs

11113212122111.content:
A couple days ago, you were forced to play dress up, and now you're anxious for it. You threw on a pair of jeans and a simple shirt, along with a jacket, and headed out into the city with your trusty card in hand. First things first, you needed to fill your belly, and Mr. Tramp was buying! You went to that expensive Mexican Buffet you had always wanted to try out, and ate about ten tacos more than you were able to. It was so good, and even better when you weren't paying!

Stuffed, you had to delay your shopping spree a little longer, with your first trip to the ladies room. It wasn't anything special, though you were audibly surprised, even though you were well aware of your new gender, that the penis wasn't there when you pulled your panties down. It was a strange sensation, having nothing there. You could swear you still felt it, but you knew it was just your mind playing tricks on you. Surprise aside, it was an okay experience. The same stuff comes out of girls that comes out of boys, after all.

Your first impulse was to go to the mall. The same mall where you had been two days prior. The first thing you do when you get there is buy that brand new smart phone you've had your eye on, and off the bill a year in advance with your card. Before you have a chance to play with it, a shiver runs down your spine, and then you see it. Kyle. Robin. Luke. Wandering around the mall, looking for something. Robin looks unenthusiastic, but Luke and Kyle are frantic. You remember how you really left them. Kyle is in your body. Robin is in Kyle's. And the fat man is in Robin's.

They approach you, and you flinch. They've caught me! But they haven't. They've never met Clair in their lives. They don't know you.

"Mam, we're looking for something. It looks like an MP3 player, but it's decked out in some odd machine parts."Robin, in Kyle's body asks you, "Have you seen it anywhere?"
11113212122111.title: Same on that end

111132121221111.content:
A surge of guilt flows through you. You can't leave them like this, but you don't want to expose your identity.

"I haven't seen it, but I think I may be able to help you kids. Here's my number, and I'll take yours. Tomorrow, I'll give you a call when I'm at work, and I believe I'll be able to sort things out for you. Just trust me." You do as you said, and arrange to bring them in to the office tomorrow, so you can get Kyle and Robin back in their bodies. Who knows? Maybe you can dish out a little revenge to the bodysnatcher while you're at it.

You leave your brother and the others, put that mess out of mind and resume what you came here for: Shopping! You make a circuit around the mall, going to each shop and grabbing anything you found interesting for clothes. You had memorized your new sizes before you left, so you can just grab as much as you can. There were all sorts of outfits, in ranges of styles. A lot of them probably not appropriate for a 35 year old woman, but frankly, you did not care. You just grabbed everything, and you could sort it out later. Unable to resist the power of infinite money, you end up picking up a few things for your apartment, too, which you arrange to have delivered.

By this point, you were unable to carry any more, and had to make a trip home to drop it off. You didn't stay long, though, because it occurred to you that you had been buying just cheapo mall clothes, and there was a street not far from here known for its fabulous stores, with high priced items.

---

You'd spent the last twelve hours shopping. Something you had never imagined you would ever do. Your living room in the apartment was loaded with plastic bags, boxes, and hangers of clothes everywhere. Maybe the next thing I should buy is a bigger apartment, you joke to yourself. You don't even know where to begin with this huge mess, and end up falling asleep on the couch before you get a chance to try on a single outfit.

You wake up feeling groggy the next morning, and look around anxiously at all of your purchases that you haven't yet been able to play with. Yet you get up, and prepare for work.
111132121221111.title: Shopsplosion

choices: No, chemistry isn't really your thing.
1111321212211111.content:
You put on one of the skirt suits you bought yesterday with some nude hose and some nice heels. You look like a typical professional woman. You giggle a little, knowing the brain behind the body was anything but.

You aren't in office for more than a few minutes before Ronald greets you. While many CEOs spend plenty of time out of the office, Ronald is very hands on. Today, he had been there since 6AM helping out with whatever he could.

While he was very impressed with your body swapper, he wondered if he could have your assistance on another project his research team had been working on. You were curious to see some of the things this large company had in the works, so you agreed. He brought you into what looked like a chemistry lab. A few scientists are in white lab coats and he hands you one before putting on one himself.

The first scientist turns around. You were surprised, she doesn't look a day over 16 years old!

"My name is Doctor Carla Wilkins," She begins, "We've been working on an age regression serum. Mr. Tramp believes this project will be extremely profitable once we perfect it."

"I could make a fortune on a product that is essentially a fountain of youth!" Ronald interrupts.

"The problem we have," Dr. Wilkins continues, "Is that the effects are currently unpredictable. With the same dosage, even accounting for weight and chemical makeup of the subject, the amount of de-aging just isn't the same. I lost about thirty years when I used it. Tom over there gained about ten."

A white haired man waved his hand. Dr. Wilkins went on, "One of our techs just yesterday regressed all the way to a baby! Mr. Tramp explained your genius to us, so maybe you can help?"
1111321212211111.title: You head to work

11113212122111111.content:
After a few days of intense research, you managed to figure out the age regression serum. Your first test subject was the lab assistant, Tom. He willingly volunteered because of the previous mistake of making him age 10 years older. After a trial run, Tom lost 5 or 6 years and was almost back to his original age.

From a makeshift crib in the corner of the lab, a baby babbled excitedly after seeing the results. The baby was actually the lab tech who was accidentally turned into a baby during the original testing period. The lab employees had all been taking turns bringing the baby home at night while they worked on a cure. You weren’t sure if you could ever duplicate the serum to make age progression possible, but maybe you would luck out.

After two more days, you were getting close to a better product. Tom had tested it and lost another 10 years and was in his mid 20’s. He was now younger than when he started. He didn’t mind his more youthful body.

Mr. Tramp was continually putting pressure on the lab to complete the project. With the deadline nearing, you decided to test a new chemical compound on yourself. After drinking the solution and feeling your body changing, you looked in the mirror. You surprisingly lost about 10 years of life and were now a 25 year old version of Clair Palmer. Her 35 year old wrinkles were gone and her body was even more tighter. The lab erupted in applause after you showed off your new body.

Ronald Tramp came in after hearing the applause, “You look great Clair! I see you perfected the chemical compound!“ Ronald explained to you, “Now that we can control this process, I am going to need a younger body too. I’m in my 40’s and if I could have my youthful body again, it would look great for the company. I could be our spokesman to advertise the youth serum!” Ronald reached for the solution and was about to drink it.

You quickly interrupted, “Wait! I’m not sure It’s perfected yet!”

Ronald looked at your body and laughed, “What are you talking about? You lost 10 years taking this. All I have to do is double the dose and I should be around 20 again, right?”

“Not exactly!” You tell Ronald, “This chemical compound is PH balanced for a woman! If you take it, you will certainly become female! And I have no idea what will happen to your age if you double the dose!”

Ronald looked at you with intrigue, “This will turn me into a woman? That’s fascinating! I have no wife or children to pass on my business to. Would this chemical retain any of my original genes? I need to make sure my family line lives on in this business.”

“Technically, Yes. You would keep your family genes. You would just be turned into a woman. I’m assuming you are talking about expanding your family tree by bearing your own children right?”

“Exactly. And with your expertise and research ability, by the time I give birth I’m sure you will have figured out a way to turn me back into a man again.”

“I cannot guarantee anything Mr. Tramp. But with the advances we are making in the lab, anything might be possible.”

Mr. Tramp was pleased, “Then it’s decided. I will take a double dose of the serum and become a fertile woman in her early 20’s! I will bear a child so my business can be passed down to the next heir someday. The economic effects will be astounding for the company after customers learned what I did!” Mr. Tramp then explains, "I trust you will assist me with advice once I am a woman. I am obviously a fast learner but I may need some consultation with adjusting to being female."

You nod, "I will assist you in any way sir. But I will remind you that I've only been a woman myself for a few weeks."

Mr. Tramp replied, "I keep forgetting you are also new to the female world. That's why i chose you to lead my research lab. You have adapted well to your new body. If I didn't know you were a man before, I'd have no idea you weren't always a woman. I'm going to need your professional assistance to make sure my transition goes just as well."

You are flattered at the compliment. You are happy that Mr. Tramp has entrusted you with so much responsibility. Mr. Tramp grabs two bottles of the serum and takes them like a shot. You barely have time to interject, “Wait! Sir! I’m not sure what taking a double dose will do!”

Mr. Tramp smiled as his body began to tingle, “I guess we will find out soon!”

You eagerly watch as his body changes. You are curious to find out what a double dose will cause to happen. Moments later, where the once 40 year old Mr. Tramp stood, was now a..............
11113212122111111.title: Sure!

111132121221111112.content:
When the changes were complete, Mr. Tramp was now drowning in his clothes. He immediately could tell his manliness was gone and he now had female anatomy. He spoke out-loud, “Splendid. The serum worked! I am obviously a woman now.” Mr. Tramp had to really arch his neck to look up at the rest of the lab personnel. He realized he was much shorter than everybody else. Mr. Tramp continued, “Height was never a genetic quality of the Tramp family. I suppose it’s only suiting that I ended up this short. He looked down at his flat chest, “Hmmm…Apparently ample bosoms don’t run in my family either. ” Noticing how high pitched his new female voice was, Mr. Tramp examined his new hands and fingers to see how tiny they were. It only took him a moment to conclude the serum had turned him into a young girl instead of a fertile 20 year old woman. Mr. Tramp looked up at you and said, “I apologize for not adhering to your professional opinion. The serum appears to have turned me into a child. Can I see a mirror please?”

You reach into your purse and pull out a compact mirror. Mr. Tramp inspects his new face. You are surprised at how well he kept his professionalism. Mr. Tramp closes the compact mirror and continues, “This body certainly won’t do. I won’t be of child bearing age for well over 10 years. “ Mr. Tramp instructed, “Dr. Wilkins. Please hand me a bottle of the age progression serum.”

Dr. Wilkins replied, “Sir…. Like Ms. Palmer mentioned earlier, we haven’t perfected the age progression serum either. It may be quite some time until we figure out the chemical compound.”

Mr. Tramp contemplated his situation. After a few moments, he continued, “I have full confidence in my lab personnel that you will figure out a way to fix this. I realize this was my fault. I was overzealous in my decision to drink the serum. Until the age progression serum is created, I will have to get used to this body. My situation will still positively impact the company image. When the public sees that such a young girl can run a million dollar business, they will certainly know our products work. “ Mr. Tramp instructed a lab assistant, “I will need new attire before returning to my office. Go pick me up a business skirt-suit in my size. I want to appear as professional as possible.”

The lab assistant replied, “I’m sorry sir. But finding a professional business woman’s skirt-suit in your size will be quite the challenge. “

Mr. Tramp realized she was right. Fortunately, one of Tramp’s other businesses was an upscale clothing company. He replied, “In that case, take my measurements and have my clothing company create me some proper business attire. Tell them to create a new line of business attire for children. Once the public learns of this serum, there may be others interested. But for the time being, I will need something to wear around the office. Have my clothing company bring me a selection of nicest outfits for a girl my size.”

“Yes sir!” The lab assistant replied as she got to work.

Mr. Tramp told his assistant, “It seems silly for all of you to be calling me sir while I’m temporarily in the body of a young girl. I shall be referred to as Ms. Tramp or ma’am from now on. In fact, I will need to change my name for formal business transactions. Have my lawyers draw up a name change for me. My new name will be Ms. Donna Tramp.” The assistant got to work on Ms. Tramp’s requests.

Ms. Tramp looked up at you and said, “We have another detail to discuss…..”

“What is it ma’am?” You ask.

Ms. Tramp replies, “I will need your professional assistance with __________”
111132121221111112.title: A 5 year old girl

1111321212211111121.content:
“How can I be of assistance ma’am?” You ask Ms. Tramp.

“My lawyers are going to have quite a challenge trying to figure out all the legal details with this serum. Until the laws are changed, I’m going to need a legal guardian. I’m only 5 years old now. I can’t legally drive a car, or even own a home. I will need to you to adopt me and act as my mother. This will be the easiest legal way to handle this situation until an age progression serum is completed.”

“I’m flattered ma’am. I appreciate you entrusting me with the responsibility.”

“I chose you because I know how easily you adjusted to being a woman. I will need some help getting used to my new body. I trust you will teach me how to act like a proper girl. As far as our living arrangements, my decorating company has already begun the modifications to my estate. I am having a girl’s bedroom installed as we speak. You can take the master bedroom since you are the adult of the family. I will have your wardrobe and belongings moved in immediately.”

Ms. Tramp then instructed, “I have been told by my advisers that I won’t be able to keep my normal schedule now that I am so young. I will require going to bed by 7:30 every night so I am well rested for work. I have always been a workaholic so this will be a huge adjustment for me. I usually stay up late into the midnight hours working on business. I give you full authority to treat me like any mother would her child at bedtime, even if it involves disciplinary actions. I will guarantee that treating me like a child will not affect your job here. I expect you to treat me like any mother would. I have been told that with my new body, I will also require a way to expend all this energy. I will need to play in a park or find some other activities to participate in that is appropriate for a girl my age. I will leave these activities up to your deciding. It will help you adjust to being a mother and having to get her daughter socially involved.”

“Yes ma’am.” You reply.

Ms. Tramp then tells you, “Our living arrangements will not be successful if you continue to refer to me as ma’am. Everybody else at work will still address me with a proper title. However, from now on, you shall refer to me as your daughter. Call me Donna, sweetie, princess or anything else you determine is appropriate for a little girl. I will of course call you Mom, or Mommy. We should get used to this right away. “

“Okay sweetie!” You reply.

The lawyers have you sign the paperwork immediately. You are now officially Donna’s mother.

Donna gives you a big hug and says, “Thanks for doing this Mommy!” before she heads back into her office.
1111321212211111121.title: Living arrangements

choices: You tell her a better approach
11113212122111111211.content:
Ms. Tramp saw the clothing company had finally arrived. She said to you, “Splendid! This will be our first test of our new mother-daughter relationship. Come on Mommy! I’ll you’re your help getting dressed!” You followed Donna into her office.

With how fast the request was made to bring up their nicest girl’s outfits, the clothing company wasn’t told the details about Mr. Tramp suddenly being turned into a girl. They assumed the request was to show off their newest fanciest outfits for a buyer of some sort.

You watched as a rack of fancy girl’s dresses were wheeled into the office. Once the door was shut, Donna eyed her clothing options. All the dresses were obviously designed as formal wear. They all looked like they could be worn to a wedding or dress-up party. Donna kept her professionalism, “I’m rather impressed with my clothing company. They brought up our best selection for girls. If I must get used to wearing dresses, I may as well learn in the finest of clothing.”

You ask her, “Which one would you like to try on first sweetie?”

Donna replies, “I’m not sure. This is why I chose you to be my mother. I’ll need your help with things like this. Go ahead Mommy. Pick out something for your daughter to wear.”

You sift through the dresses and hold a few up to Donna’s body. You choose a blue dress with a bow in the back that matches Donna’s eyes. After examining the boxes, you pull out a pair of white tights and black mary jane shoes. You tell Donna, “Arms up!” You pull the dress over her head and tie the bow in the back. You are pleased with how it fits her. Next you help her get her legs into the tights and buckle her shoes. You take a few minutes to do her hair and smile, “Go ahead and take a look!”

Donna turns to the mirror and sees her reflection. She stares at her appearance for a few moments. She turns back and forth getting used to the feeling of a dress swishing. She looks up at you with a pleased face, “Thanks Mom. This outfit will work fine. But these pigtails have got to go.”

“…Fine? You look better than fine sweetie. You look totally adorable in that dress! And your hair looks cute!”

“I agree. But I’m not looking to appear ‘adorable’ at work. I want my business associates to take me seriously and treat me like the business professional that I am. I feel a bit overdressed in this fancy outfit. But it is the best option until my clothing company finishes producing a line of professional business skirts for children.” Donna pointed to her hair and said, “These pigtails make me look too young. Try pulling it back like yours in a more professional manner.”

You take a deep breath and tell Donna, “Okay. You are the one who wanted my help. I’m officially your mother now. You trusted me to make parenting decisions for you right?”

“Of course I did Mom. I fully trust your judgment and need your help to adjusting to being a woman.”

“First of all, you are not a woman yet. You are a girl. There is a reason why girls don’t wear professional looking business suits and high heels. Think about how clumsy that would look. Girls don’t have the right curves to look flattering in a tight business suit. And girls don’t have breasts to make a low cut blouse look appropriate. And they certainly don’t have the experience to attempt to walk in high heels.”

Donna nodded, “I understand your point.”

“Secondly, whether you realize it or not, none of your business associates are going to let a little girl make million dollar deals. Even though you are really an experienced 40 year old man, you currently have the body of a child. Nobody is going to take you seriously. If you want to successfully market your age regression serum, you may want to use a different approach. “

“How so?” Donna asks.
11113212122111111211.title: Ms. Trump's clothing arrives

111132121221111112111.content:
“Think about the potential. You managed to build this entire empire from scratch. You own numerous companies and are worth millions. That took you over 40 years to accomplish. Not to mention the 6 years of college to get your masters degree. Look at you now. You are only 5 years old. You essentially have 35 more years until you were the same age before you drank the serum. Think about how much more you could learn and how many more degrees you could get in that time. ”

“Are you suggesting growing up all over again?” Donna asked.

“Yes. That could be how you market the age regression serum! You still have all your knowledge. Grade school and high school would be a breeze a second time. You could get another college degree and continue to learn even more powerful business techniques.”

“Wait a second. Why would I waste my time going to grade school and high school all over again?”

“It wouldn’t be wasting time. That’s how you would market your age regression serum. It’s everybody’s dream to be young again. It would be a perk of taking the serum. You’d be able to experience the innocence of childhood and have fun growing up again. People could even choose different career paths or choose a different place to live. You would market it as a second chance.”

“You are really onto something here. What about parents? Who would agree to raise a child all over again knowing they used the serum?”

You giggle, “People of your wealth can afford anything. Look at me. I agreed to be your Mommy. As you know, the lawyers had to write the contract to sign over all your assets to me. So as long as I am your Mommy, I essentially control your money. I’d say that’s worth raising a child!“

“You are right. We need to get the serum on the market immediately!”

“Unfortunately, we can’t do that yet. I’m going to need more time to properly develop the chemicals. I still have no idea why the serum regressed your age 35 years and changed your gender. We have to get this perfect if we are going to sell it to the public. In the mean time, I’d suggest you take a break from acting as the front man of your company. You have plenty of assistants that can run it while you are gone. You’d still be consulted for the big decisions. But your main job would be to grow up again. That would help market the age regression serum to prove there was a successful experiment going on. Essentially, that means you get an extra 35 years to prepare for running the company full time again. You’ll be 35 years smarter. You could even decide to birth a child like you mentioned before. That way if something ever happened, you would ensure the business would stay in the family. By that time, we will have mastered the gender serum. You could go back to being a man whenever you wanted. “

Donna’s mind was running wild. All she was thinking about was how much money this could bring to the company. Donna smiled, “You are a marketing genius Mommy! This is going to be worth billions and billions of dollars!” Donna looked in the mirror and smiled at her reflection, “I suppose I could get used to these pigtails!”

You smile, “That’s the spirit sweetie! I assume you would like to attend private school. I will call them and get you enrolled in kindergarten right away.”

Donna got an uneasy feeling, “Kindergarten right away? I already know how to tie my shoes. Is that really necessary? Can’t I take a few months to get used to being a girl first?”

You tell her, “Trust me. I’m your mother. The best way for you to learn to be a girl is to be around other girls. It will give you a chance to make some friends and start socializing. You are going to love it!”
111132121221111112111.title: The new marketing approach

choices: Tramp explains the new marketing approach
111132121221111112112.content:
“Like I mentioned before, it will be difficult to persuade your highest level executives of your company to take orders from a 5 year old girl. They are all men in their 40’s and won’t take you seriously. In order to successfully maintain control of your empire, you will need to level the playing field.”

Donna appreciates your advice and asks, “How do you suggest I level the playing field?”

“You said you trust me right? Call your executives into your office for a meeting. Give me 30 minutes and I will take care of the rest.”

30 minutes later, Tramp walked back into the office. Instead of seeing all of her executives in their regular older male bodies, there was now a group of little girls sitting around the conference table all wearing dresses from the clothing rack. Because the chairs were designed for adults, all the girls could barely see over the conference table. Tramp took the normal spot at the head of the table. It was easy to figure out who was who because of their regular assigned seating at the conference table.

You were now the only adult in the office room. You winked at Donna and said, “As you can see, the playing field has been leveled. “

Donna was pleased with your idea. Now the entire staff of Tramp’s company were also children. All the girls clapped and congratulated Tramp on the breakthrough of the new serum. From years of habit of addressing his executive team, Tramp opened up with the regular greeting, “We have a lot of work to do gentlemen.” All the executives laughed as Tramp corrected his words, “I mean we have a lot of work to do ladies.” The room laughed again realizing that the term ‘ladies’ was also a stretch. Donna continued the speech, “I commend you all for agreeing to take the serum like I did. Together we will show the business world how advanced and organized we can be in the bodies of such young children. We will all be examples on how successful this can be. CEO’s around the globe will be interested in experiencing the feeling of youth again while still running their companies. As you may have heard, I have chosen the name Donna Tramp for the time being. You can refer to me as Ms. Tramp or ma’am from now on. The legal team is already doing the paperwork to change all of your names so business correspondence will be official with your new bodies.

The executives all clapped again at the speech. Tramp pointed to the new business plan folders and instructed everybody, “Ok young ladies. Everybody flip to page one. We will start going over the plan immediately.”

One of the executives suddenly had an uneasy feeling. She tried to quietly get up and slip out of the room without interrupting. However, Tramp noticed immediately and was shocked that she was interrupting the meeting, “Where are you going?”

She had an embarrassed face and explained, “I’m sorry ma’am. I suddenly really have to use the bathroom. Can we take a quick break?” Mumbles began going around the room as the other girls seemed happy they might be taking a break. Another girl jumped in, “She’s right boss. I really have to pee too!” The other girls all nodded with the same uneasy feeling.

Tramp looked around at the rest of the girls and laughed, “It appears that our bladders are much smaller with these bodies. I could use the bathroom too. Let’s take a 5 minute break.”

All the girls excitedly started rushing towards the door. They all instinctively headed towards the men’s bathroom that was conveniently located right outside of the conference room. They all realized their mistake and one of them asked, “Where is the ladies restroom anyways?”

The female secretary cracked a grin at seeing the confused girls. The secretary had worked there for years and was always complaining about the lack of women’s restrooms located around the building. The excuse was always that there weren’t that many women working at for the Tramp company so they didn’t need as many. The secretary got a slight degree of satisfaction by pointing across the building, “I’m sorry girls, but the only ladies room on this floor is way down there around the corner at the end of the hall.”

The group of girls all rushed down the hall in a frenzy. Their tiny legs made the walk seem even further. When they arrived at the ladies room, there were only 3 stalls inside. They rushed back and forth taking turns.

When they were finally done, they walked back down the long hallway to the conference room. As they passed the secretary, Ms. Tramp instructed, “Have the building manager remodel this men’s’ room to a ladies room. I can’t have my executives walking that far every time they need to use the bathroom!”

The secretary giggled and thought to herself, “It’s about time there was closer ladies bathroom around s here!”

Once all the girls were back at their seats around the conference table, Ms. Tramp realized the break was almost 20 minutes long, “Okay girls. We are behind schedule. Everybody open up their business plans to page one and we will continue..”
111132121221111112112.title: You tell her a better approach

1111321212211111121121.content:
Another executive interrupted, “Is anybody else hungry?” Another executive agreed, “Yea. I’m thirsty too! Why isn’t there coffee out?”

You quickly interrupted, “We removed the coffee machine from the conference room for the time being. Your bodies would never be able to handle the caffeine rush from your normal coffees. Juice or milk will be appropriate in your new bodies.”

One of them sighed, “Whatever. We are all thirsty and hungry. Can we get some sort of catering in here please?”

Tramp wanted to get the meeting going but he knew his executives would work better without being hungry. Tramp realized she could use a snack too. Tramp instructed the secretary to have the catering company bring up 10 snack meals for the girls. 5 minutes later, the meals arrived. They all opened the paper sacks and pulled out their snack. An executive laughed, “Cool! I haven’t had a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for years! This looks delicious!”

Another executive pulled out the drink and laughed, “Seriously? They put our juice in sippy cups?”

Just then from across the table, another executive tried to take a drink from the sippy cup and accidentally dropped it. Everybody laughed and one of the executives joked, “Maybe it was a good thing they gave us sippy cups! That would have spilled all over!”

Another executive down the table suddenly yelled out, “Crap! I need a napkin!” They all looked over and saw she had dripped peanut butter onto her dress while trying to take a bite.”

You quickly sprung into action and grabbed a wet napkin. You tried to blot out the peanut butter but it stained her dress. Looking around, you noticed the chaos of the girls trying to eat. Sippy cups were being dropped and peanut butter and jelly blobs were falling everywhere. You quickly dash into action trying to clean the messes. You finally announce loudly, “Girls! Slow down! Your bodies aren’t as coordinated as they used to be. You are going to have to eat slower and take your time.”

All the girls looked up at you at the same time. They all had peanut butter stuck to their lips and cheeks. The secretary was then only other adult so she helped you walk around and wipe their faces clean. The executives couldn’t help but laugh at how clumsy their bodies seemed. All of their dresses now had stains.

After cleaning the girls and the table, Ms. Tramp finally got back to business, “Okay young ladies. Open your folders to page 1 and we will get this meeting started….”

One of the executives jumped off her seat, “Sorry boss! I gotta pee again!” Another 2 girls jumped down and said, “Me too!” A 4th girl joined in and said, “Let’s race!” The 4 girls all ran out the door racing to the women’s bathroom all the way down the long hallway. Ms. Tramp sighed as the meeting had to be postponed again.
1111321212211111121121.title: The girls get hungry

choices: The wives meet their new daughters
11113212122111111211211.content:
When the 4 girls got back from the bathroom, they were about to start the meeting again when Tramp had an uneasy feeling. He politely excused himself, “Sorry girls. This is embarrassing. Now I need to pee.”

5 minutes later when Tramp returned, he was surprised to see what the executives were doing. 3 girls were running around the table playing tag. 3 girls were standing in a circle twirling their dresses around until they fell over laughing. The rest of them were stretching on the floor doing the splits. One of them looked up and saw Tramp was back, “Check it out boss! Look how flexible our bodies are now!”

Tramp yelled loudly, “Ahem! Girls!” Everybody stopped what they were doing and quickly took their seats around the conference room. Only their heads were tall enough to reach the table top. Tramp made a mental note that smaller chairs and tables were going to be necessary in the near future. All the girls had the same look that they had been caught doing something wrong. Tramp explained, ‘I completely understand what you are all going through. I’m dealing with the same thing. Our bodies have much more energy now but we need to be professional and keep our composure. We have a lot of work to do and I need you all to focus your bran power and energy on our new business plan!”

The girls all mumbled in unison, “Yes ma’am.”

“Good. Now let’s get to work!” Just then, another interruption happened. The company lawyers all came inside. They had piles of paperwork for everybody to sign that included their new names and custody contracts. As they began reading the contracts, one of the executives asked, “What are these custody papers all about? Why is my wife’s name on the form?”

The lawyers explained, “Until we figure out the legalities of the serum, we are going to have to follow current laws. That means each of you will need a legal guardian. Your wives have all been contacted about your situation and are being de-briefed in the conference room next door. For the time being, you will all be legally adopted by your wives. This is the quickest way to continue business as usual.”

The girls all flipped through the contracts and signed each page. One of the girls noticed a generous check at the back of the packet and asked, “Wow! What is this check for? And why is it written out to my wife?”

The lawyer explained, “You all are receiving a bonus check to cover the expenses of new clothing and supplies for your bodies. We had to make them out to your wives because girls your age can’t cash a check.”

Once everybody finished signing the contracts, the lawyers said, “Now that the paperwork is finished, it’s time to bring your wives in. They are all eager to see you. I’ll let them know it’s okay to come in now.”
11113212122111111211211.title: The company lawyers arrive

111132121221111112112111.content:
When the conference door opened up, a bunch of confused women walked in wondering who was their former husband. Some of the women were carrying babies and had other small children with them. It only took a few moments for each of the girls to run up and introduce themselves to their families. The room was now filled with loud talking and laughter while they all met each other. Ms. Tramp let everyone converse for a few minutes. It was interesting to see the families reacting to their new daughters and sisters. Tramp noticed that some of his executives were now younger than their own children. Over the years, Tramp had gotten to know the executive’s families well. They had plenty of work parties and events. The entire executive team was close and enjoyed some wild parties. Tramp knew for the time being that their wild expensive parties would be much different now.

Ms. Tramp finally got everybody’s attention with a speech, “I appreciate all of you coming in on short notice. I’ve known you all for years and trust you will do your best to deal with the temporary changes in your lives. I understand how strange this must be to see your husbands and fathers like this.”

One of the executive’s daughters named Madeline let out a giggle, “Me and Daddy can play dress up together now!”

The room erupted in laughter. One of the wives also joked, “Madeline is right! Her birthday party is tomorrow and everybody is invited.” With a wink across the room, she laughed, “It’s a princess theme and I can’t wait to see all your girls dressed up!”

The room laughed again and everybody began making jokes about their situation. It was 5 minutes until Ms. Tramp managed to get the room under control. “Okay everybody. You will have plenty of time to continue this conversation when your husbands…I mean…when your daughters get home tonight after work. For now, I need my executives to continue looking over the business plan. It’s already 3 o’clock and we only have a few hours left of work.”

One of the wives asked, “Wait a second. How is everybody going to get home? None of you can drive your cars now?”

One of the executives replied, “We could take the train or bus.”

Another wife jumped in, “…That’s crazy. Little girls can’t ride the train or bus alone. And what about the morning commute to work? How are we supposed to get our new daughters to work everyday while juggling our real children and their school schedules? And how are you going to get to business meetings everyday across the city?”

The room got loud again while everybody started discussing transportation options. This was a detail that Ms. Tramp hadn’t considered when she turned her entire executive staff into children. Ideas were being passed around about taking taxis to work. Somebody suggested a driving service pick everybody up. As everybody argued back and forth, one of the wives pointed out, “…That won’t work! None of the taxis or diving services in town even has car seats!”

The room quieted down after hearing about car seats. One of the executives looked down at her new body and said, “Shit! We are all going to have to ride in car seats now aren’t we?”

The executive’s wife instinctively scolded her new daughter, “Watch your mouth young lady! You shouldn’t talk like that!”

The room erupted again in loud arguing. Another executive looked at his wife and said, “There is no way I’m getting buckled into a stupid car seat!”

Ms. Tramp took control, “Quiet everybody! We need to make something clear. I can’t risk my executives being injured in a car accident or getting in trouble for breaking the law. I don’t want to sit in a car seat either, but given the size of our new bodies, we will all have to adjust to these types of changes.” Mumbles were passed around the room as everybody seemed to be taking in the reality of the new changes in their lives. One of the executives groaned, “Damn. I gotta pee again.” All the wives gasped again at hearing such vulgar language coming from a young girl. Tramp interjected, “Please girls! We all need to watch our language!” Two other girls got the same uneasy feeling and had to pee again too. As half of the room started leaving, Tramp decided to call it a day, “Okay everybody! I can see that we are all getting frustrated and we all need some time to adjust. Everybody go home early and be back Monday morning.”

All the families left as Tramp looked at you and asked, “Mommy, are you sure we made the right decision? We didn’t get anything done today with all the potty breaks and arguing?”

You consoled her, "Don't worry sweetie. They are all professionals. They are just getting used to their new bodies. This weekend will be a perfect opportunity with everybody socializing at Madeline's birthday party tomorrow."

Tramp nodded, "You are right Mommy. The party will be fun and us kids will be able to run around and get rid of some of this energy."

You wink at your daughter and give her a kiss, "We better get to the store! You don't want to be the only little girl at the party without a pretty princess dress!"

Tramp cracks a grin, "Thanks for all your help Mommy!"
111132121221111112112111.title: The wives meet their new daughters

choices: Meeting the other company who took the new serum
1111321212211111121121112.content:
The scene at the start of the work day was much different than normal. With everybody reporting as usual to the conference room first thing Monday morning, it looked more like a school drop off zone rather than a professional office building. Since the top executives were all now 5 year old girls, all the wives had to bring them to work. The wives were all making last minute adjustments to their husbands-turned-little girls outfits for the day. They were fixing the girls hair, tying ribbons or putting rubber bands in. They were also helping them take off their coats and making sure their dresses weren’t wrinkled. Because they weren’t strong enough to carry their normal briefcases, all the girls now had backpacks with cartoon characters on them. It was impossible to find a proper backpack that wasn’t decorated with a princess theme or a character from a cartoon. One of the wives was licking a napkin and wiping off smudges on her girl’s face. She seemed to be scolding her for being so careless eating in the car. Another wife was helping her girl wash her hands. They were still sticky from breakfast this morning. Eventually, the wives finished preparing their girls for the day and hugged them goodbye.

Mr. Tramp (now Miss Tramp) was relieved the drop-off was over. With the wives gone, they could finally get down to business. The executives were pleased to see their meeting table had been replaced over the weekend. There was now kid chairs and a low table so they could sit around comfortably. Miss Tramp watched as his executive team got settled in. They all took their items out of their sparkly backpacks and set up their work stations. They all put juice boxes or sippy cups of milk in their cup holders that their wives had packed. They took out their new Business Plans that the meeting was going to cover. Miss Tramp was surprised to see that instead of the blue professional folders he handed out on Friday, everybody had replaced their folders with cartoon themed folders. Tramp also saw some of his execs pulling blankets dolls and stuffed animals out of their backpacks and setting them up around their area. What seemed like forever, the group of 5 year old girls were finally ready for the meeting to start.

Tramp took the floor, “Welcome back everybody. I trust you all took the weekend to get used to your new bodies. I know it was quite the adjustment for myself. You are fortunate to all have understanding wives to help you adjust. Now let’s get to business. I trust you all went over the new Business Plan for the company?”

All the execs looked around each other with nervous faces. They all began grumbling and it was obvious they hadn’t read the Business Plan. Tramp got mad and looked at his Chief Financial Officer and said, “You didn’t even read it? You are supposed to be my right-hand-man…or…right-hand-girl now.”

The Financial Officer replied, “Sorry boss. I got drug around on errands all weekend with my wife and kids. It’s pretty hard to read while strapped in a carseat.”

Another executive giggled, “And specially when a good movie is on the DVD player!”

The rest of the girls laughed at the joke. Tramp continued, “I know everybody went to Madeline’s birthday party on Saturday. I’ll admit it was nice to socialize with our new bodies to help us adjust. But everybody had all day Sunday to review the Business Plan.” Tramp addressed his Chief of Marketing and asked, “You didn’t read it either?”

The Marketing Chief shook her head, “Sorry. I had dance class that took most of the morning and then….”

Tramp interrupted, “Dance class? You are in a dance class now?”

The Marketing Chief nodded, “I have two daughters in dance. My wife suggested I join too because I would be bored just sitting there all day. We are practicing for a recital at the end of next month if any of you want to go! Oh yea, and dance practices are also Wednesday afternoons so I’ll need to leave work early.”

Tramp rolled his eyes finding out his Chief of Marketing was in dance class now. He sarcastically asked, “Does anybody else have any conflicts I need to know about?”

Another exec chimed in, “I have gymnastics on Tuesdays and Thursdays now. I’ll have to leave early on those days too.” Tramp sighed knowing he encouraged his execs to try and fit in with their new bodies. He didn't imagine they would all join extra curricular activities that would take time away from work.

The Sales Executive who hadn’t spoken up yet finally chimed in, “It’s bring your daughter to work day at my wife’s building on Friday so I’ll need a day off.” Tramp seemed irritated that one of his execs was already asking for an entire day of vacation during such an important time for the company. Tramp noticed his Sales Exec was wearing an extremely fancy dress that looked like it was designed for a pageant or wedding. His hair was amazingly done. His wife must have helped him for hours getting him ready for work. Tramp asked, “Uh..What’s with the dress?” The Sales Exec explained, “My only two kids are sons. My wife is taking advantage of finally having a little girl to dress up. That’s why it’s so important for her to take me to work on Friday. She’s never had a daughter before to bring.”

Another exec raised his hand and replied, “I have a doctor’s appointment tomorrow at 2. I’m getting all my shots.”

A gasp went across the crowd. Another exec asked, “Wait a second? Do we ALL have to get shots again now that we have new bodies?”

An exec nodded, “Yea. It was in the legal contract our lawyers gave our wives. I didn’t read it but my wife told me I had to get them all over again. You all know how fast illnesses can spread among kids.” Several of the execs suddenly started mumbling and seemed scared they about getting shots. Tramp interrupted the gossip session, “Girls! Can we please get started with the meeting. We need to get something accomplished today. I have a big announcement about another company who took our new serum that was designed by our best scientists.”

One of the Execs joked, “So there’s another management team that was turned into little girls too?” Tramp shook his head, “No. They are all now female, but they aren’t kids. Our Scientists manage to get the serum under control and they all ended up women in their mid 20’s. They will be coming by this afternoon to thank us for the serum. It already has benefited their stock holdings now that the company is ran by women. They got tons of tax breaks and are able to get minority business loans and are taking advantage of their new business model.”

An Exec piped up from the back, “So why didn’t WE take that batch? We would have atleast ended up as adults like the other company!” Tramp explained, “When we took the serum, our scientists hadn’t perfected the chemical mixture yet. And since we all already altered our bodies once, we will need a reversal potion first before any of us can use another potion. It’s too dangerous otherwise. Our best scientists are working on that now. Hopefully they will have something for us to take by……”

An exec stood up and looked uneasy, “Hold that thought boss. Sorry but I really gotta tinkle!” She practically ran out the door. All the other execs took the opportunity to use the bathroom too and ran out after her. Now that Tramp was the only one left in the conference room, he groaned knowing he had to go too. He quickly followed the others racing down the hallway. The construction crew had not yet completed the conversion of the men’s room outside the conference room into a ladies room yet. All the execs ran down the long hallway and across the building to the nearest ladies room. The secretaries up front couldn’t help but giggle. They were pleased that they were finally getting a ladies room that was much closer.

As Tramp stood at the back of the line to the ladies room, he couldn't help but think about if he'd made a mistake turning his entire staff into little girls. He wondered if they would ever get any work done like this.
1111321212211111121121112.title: Monday morning at work

11113212122111111211211122.content:
The next few days at Ronald Tramp’s company seemed to go a bit better. The new ladies bathroom remodel was finally finished and there were two special stalls with tiny toilets designed for kids. There was also a kid sized sink installed so they didn’t have to use a step to wash their hands. The Exec’s loved being able to easily slip out of their offices and meetings now and use a much closer bathroom. The other real women in the office were loving the fact there was finally a woman’s bathroom located near them.

Each Exec also had their offices modified with small desks so they could work on their computers comfortably. Miss Tramp looked the other way when one of the Execs placed a gym mat and a bar in the corner of the office so she could practice gymnastics during down time. All their secretaries would help them with their hair every time a client came in for a meeting so they looked presentable. They’d also make sure none of them had chocolate milk stains on their cheeks or stains on their clothes. The office seemed to be functioning even though the most important people in the company were all little girls now. Tramp was still a bit mad that most of his staff would leave early for extracurricular activities like dance class and ballet. He was glad his team members were accepting their new bodies but was also getting concerned about all of their absences and leaving early.

On Friday, Tramp called a meeting in the morning. He was about to start when he noticed one of his Executives outfit. Tramp shook his head, “Seriously? You wore a Cinderella dress-up costume to work?”

The Executive gave a cute smile and laughed, “What’s the big deal? It’s casual Friday right? Plus this tiara is really cute isn’t it?”

Tramp agreed but made a mental note to adjust the company’s dress code policy. Tramp hoped ‘Cinderella’ didn’t have any important meetings today. Just as Tramp started the meeting again, one of the wives came in flustered and was practically dragging the Chief Financial Officer along. The wife went straight up to Tramp and apologized, “I’m sorry for bringing her late to work. But we had a difficult time getting out of the house. I let her stay up too late and she was a complete brat this morning. I have 3 other kids to get ready for school and when she refused to wear what I set out and threw a tantrum, I decided to let her dress herself.” The wife pulled off the Financial Officer’s coat to reveal a pink frilly leotard and tutu skirt. The wife rolled her eyes, “I tried telling her it was an inappropriate outfit for work, but SOMEBODY just had to wear it!” The Financial Officer stuck his tongue out and took a seat at the conference table. The wife seemed mad at the attitude and snapped at her, “Just for that young lady, you are going to bed an hour early tonight!” The Financial Officer crossed her arms and pouted. The wife turned to Tramp and complained, “Do you see what I have to deal with at home? It’s hard enough to get 3 REAL kids ready in the morning. Now I have to deal with a bratty 4th kid who is impossible sometimes! Is there any progress being made on the serum to turn my husband back to normal?”

The wife’s ruckus was heard from down the hall. A company lawyer stuck his head into the conference room to explain, “Technically ma’am, she is legally your daughter according to the custody paperwork you signed.”

The wife rolled he eyes, “I know! Now I have 4 kids to take care of alone!”

The lawyer suggested, “Nobody said you had to do it alone. We have no idea how long it’s going to take for our scientists to develop a reversal serum.”

The wife seemed intrigued, “Are you saying I could start dating again?”

The rest of the Executives around the table all let out a gasp thinking of their own wives doing the same thing. The company lawyer nodded, “Of course you can. You were legally divorced once your husbands were turned into little girls. You would be well within the law to date or even re-marry if you wanted to.”

The wife was still mad about dealing with a bratty kid this morning and glared at her former husband, “In that case, I’m getting a babysitter tonight! I deserve a night on the town away from kids!”

The angry wife stormed out of the office as the company lawyer opened his briefcase. He took the opportunity to start passing out paperwork and a form for everybody to fill out. He explained, “It’s that time of year again. Everybody has to renew their health insurance coverage." The Chief Financial Officer glared at the company lawyer and pushed the paperwork away with a snotty glare, “Gee. Thanks a lot!
