Now my wife is going to start dating!” Another exec pointed out the obvious complaining, “So let me get this straight… Since all of us are legally minors now, our wives not only have full financial rights to every dime we earn, now they can get remarried?” Another exec’s eyes got wide as he mentioned, “Uh oh! My neighbor has been hanging out at my house a lot lately. He stays late after I go to bed too. You don’t think they are….”

The company lawyer interrupted the chatter, “I’m sorry little ladies, but your wives can legally do whatever they want with their love life. When…Or if…our scientists ever develop a serum to return you all to normal, we can deal with other legal repercussions then. But for now, I need you all to review your current health insurance coverage and return the forms to me tomorrow. If you want to keep your same coverage from last year just have your wives sign the first form. If you want to sign up for a different program, have her sign page 2 under the line with the new coverage.”

The exec wearing the Cinderella dress-up gown complained, “Hold on? We can’t just sign these forms ourselves?”

The lawyer shook his head, “No. You all understand whenever we have employees under the age of 18, their legal guardians must endorse any changes to their paycheck. Your wives may want to change your family’s current health plan now that they all have an extra child around. They have the legal right to decide what coverage is appropriate now.”

A different exec started giggling across the table while stuffing the pile of paperwork into her backpack, “Better her than me! I always hated reading these complicated health insurance forms!” The rest of the execs followed suit and stuffed the forms into their bags to bring home to their wives.

Once the company lawyer was gone, Miss Tramp took the floor in attempts to finally start the morning meeting. With all the distractions, they hadn’t even discussed anything yet. However, a secretary interrupted the meeting by carrying in a tray of food, “Who wants cookies and milk?”

All the execs were excited to have a snack and raised their hands like they were at school. The secretary smiled and explained, “Okay girls. But everybody has to wash their hands first! It’s a good time to take a potty break anyways.” The execs all seemed relieved as they scurried off to the bathroom.

Tramp was glad for the bathroom break too. But he was also starting to worry about the future of the company. With himself and all the execs now stuck as little girls, the productivity at work had slowed down immensely. Tramp had to come up with a way to get some work done around here.
11113212122111111211211122.title: More work issues arise

choices: "Sorry, but Mr. Tramp doesn't know anyone named Clair Palmer."
"Mr. Tramp is eagerly awaiting your arrival, Miss Palmer."
1111321212211112.content:
Ann Taylor. Guess. Michael Kors. Gucci. These designer brands and more grace your bedroom closet as you select something to wear to work today. First, however, you feel around the table next to the couch for Clair's glasses. Well... now they're your glasses, and you'll have to wear them for the time being.

Mmm, how might you look with contact lenses? Or perhaps LASIK eye surgery? You stand in front of a full-body mirror in the bedroom as Clair's eyes stare back. Her brown irises now blinking warmly back at you in the reflection, a notable change from the piercing gaze yesterday's former occupant of this body had. Stripping out of your pyjamas, then, you hop in the shower and rinse off, spending extra time to sort through your new mane of hair and blow-dry it afterwards. Tying her hair back into a bun seems like the proper thing to do, but that was the old Clair Palmer. You decide the new Clair should let loose a bit more, opting to let her gorgeous locks flow down past your slender shoulders and tickle the back of your neck.

Working away at your face and lips, primping for the first full day at Tramp's office, you find yourself giggling. The real Luke would never spend so much time caring about looking good. Looking pretty. And even though you're still new and inexperienced at applying makeup, you think back to Mom and Erika and try to copy what they do to get ready each morning. Never having thought you would be experiencing this world of womanhood so intimately.

Then you slip on a thong, a pair of fishnet stockings, and shimmy your hips and arse into a tight black pencil skirt. Maybe it is Clair's legs which best showcase her toned physique? You run a hand down her shapely gams in admiration, smoothing out the skirt so it hugs against your hairless thighs. Her flat stomach and slightest hint of abs also attest to her self discipline, probably exercising almost every day. Even though she is a 35-year-old woman about twice your age, you still feel limber and energetic!

Next, you throw on a chiffon-trim cardigan over an equally lacy bra and blouse combo. Finding little trouble in fitting the cups of a new 34C bra over Clair's bosom and snugging the hooks in back. You twirl again in the mirror to get as much of a 360-degree view as possible, sighing out of satisfaction with the whole ensemble. Yes, it was way more work getting ready in the morning, but you're a woman now and that's just what women do. Especially those wanting to make a good impression on their first day of working for the renowned Ronald Tramp!

For a finishing touch, you slip on the sexiest pair of stiletto heels and practice mincing about the apartment. The smart clicking of heel on tile, the hypnotic swishing of hips constrained in the skirt, and the light bouncing of hair and breasts all combining to form a major turn-on. At least, that's what you presume based on the tongue-dropping looks of various men outside, as you make your way to the nearest subway station. Several of them leer at you like a piece of meat and make no disguise of training their eyes on your supple, feminine figure. Maybe this is what Clair was talking about when she was complaining about sexism yesterday at the office?

At the ticket kiosk, on the platform, in the train compartment, you feel more eyes swarming over you. You've been to the city before, of course, seen beautiful women and couldn't help but steal a glance or two yourself. But it's quite different now that you're the one being visually stripped and fucked... and it's so unnerving the way some of the creepier passengers are looking too! A part of you wishes there was more in Clair's handbag than apartment keys, lip gloss, tissues, breath mints, and a few credit cards. Like a can of mace, that would be nice. Better yet, that paralytic spray you invented to deal with Chris Knudson, a meathead bully at the school you used to attend.

All this time, you realise how long it took to get ready this morning. Most of the morning commuters must already be at work, since the trains appear relatively moderate and unlike what you'd expect from rush hour. You curse to yourself and pull out your smartphone to confirm the time.

Another thought crosses your mind: Tramp hasn't called you back since departing from his office yesterday afternoon. Not that you are expecting a busy man like him to shoot the shit... but something doesn't feel right. At the very least, you would expect Tramp to call wondering when the boy genius inventor will come to work and show him the full potential from the body-swapping machine. Tramp seemed extremely enthusiastic about its use, and you doubt he would put it off no matter what else is happening right now in his empire.

You dial his office number and place the phone to your ears. It rings a few times before going to voicemail. Grunting, you wait a few minutes before trying again. This time, a birdlike female voice chirps on the other end:

"Ronald Tramp's office, this is Tanya, how can I help you?"

Crap... his secretary. This is the line to his secretary's office. Tramp must have mistakenly given you that number instead of the direct line to his own office. And while his secretary did help get the old Clair situated into her new life as a 60-year old obese man, you're not certain how much she knows about the machine or your agreement to work for Tramp. You clear your throat and reply, "Um, hello. My name is Clair Palmer. I was hoping to speak to Mister Tramp. Do you know if he's available right now?"

"Please hold for a moment." Curtly responds Tanya, the secretary. You suspect she is transferring you to his line, or at least seeing if he's in a meeting. While you're waiting to be taken off hold, you feel the train compartment shift and jolt a bit. You're almost to Tramp Tower, that indelible sky-contouring symbol of the big city.

Finally, the secretary cuts back in. What does she say to you??
1111321212211112.title: You call in

111132121222.content:
"Well, maybe Ms. Palmer is a little older than you're looking for. Maybe the next girl is a little more up your alley." Clair left, clearly irritated, and the next girl came in right after her.

The next woman was younger,you estimated about 24, and she was on the verge of crying before she laid eyes on you. She took a step back, about to leave, but then continued forward. She was average. She wore torn jeans under a red dress. She wore her hair in a ponytail, and was just a little chubby from too much fast food. Just a little. Her most distinguishing feature was a set of massive "My... My name is Ariel Marseny," she said timidly.

"Please tell my friend a little about yourself, Ariel. Why you're here."

"I'm in debt. My husband and I are in trouble, and I have no other choice. I don't make enough money at the salon, and neither does he at his job. We want better for ourselves, but we just can't get ahead. I heard there was a money reward..." She looks at you again, and the tears well up. "I... Is there anyone else I can... I don't care who, just a woman! Any woman! I don't want my husband to stop loving me!"

Tramp shakes his head. "I'm sorry, miss. This interview is about finding a new body for my friend here. When these services are opened to the public, you will be very welcome to return and get a new body for yourself. I'll even give you a special discount for helping us out here."

Ariel nods, sniffles and says. "Okay, I'll do it."

Ronald turns to you. "But will you do it?"
111132121222.title: Second Candidate: Ariel Marseny

1111321212222.content:
"Absolutely not." Mr. Tramp nods, and sends Ariel away. She looks both heartbroken that she won't be receiving the money, and relieved that she gets to keep her body. You hope she has better luck with money in the future. "Just for giggles, do you have any male candidates?"

Ronald shrugs his shoulders and sighs. "Money can only convince so many people to trade their bodies in this day. Until we market the process and increase public acceptance, our choices are going to be quite limited, here, Luke. I don't have any handsome, young businessmen. But if you insist."


The third candidate rolled into the office in a wheel chair. He was wearing black pants, a nicely pressed shirt, and tie. He looked about 30. "My name is Mathew Blake. I was in a car accident a few years ago. When I emerged from my coma after a few months, I could barely move. It's been a long journey, but through a lot of hard work and therapy, I've managed to take back life."

"A hard working young man. But the wheelchair?"

"I've reached the limits of my recovery, unfortunately. The nerves in my legs are totally severed. No amount of rehab will bring back the use of my legs." Mathew looked at you, with eyes full of determination. "Besides my legs, I swear I'm the healthiest person you could meet. I know you might feel hopeless with that body, but I'm certain if I was able to overcome this body, I can overcome yours too. I want to start from scratch, with a working pair of legs, and nobody to pity me because of my condition!"

"I like you, kid. No matter what my friend here decides, I'd like you to talk to my secretary on the way out, and we'll arrange a job interview."
1111321212222.title: Third Candidate: Mathew Blake

11113212122222.content:
Mathew leaves the office, partially bummed, but also excited that he might get a job working for THE Ronald Tramp!

"Send in the next one!"

The next candidate walked in, wearing a large, loose fitting dress. She was in her mid 20's. Her hair was brown, and hanging low down her back. Her stomach was... Huge."My name is Tara Evans, and... As you can see, I am pregnant. About seven months so. I don't believe in abortion, but I do not want to have a child."

"Why don't you simply put the child up for adoption," Tramp asks.

"You misunderstand me. If I had to raise this child, I would do my best as a mother. I might actually like that. I don't want to have the child. I'm terrified of childbirth. My mother died giving birth to me, and I've been terrified of pregnancy for as long as I've known what sex is. I can't have this baby! I'm not ready to die! I can't do it! I'll take care of my child once it's born, but I can't go through the birth myself! I don't have time to wait for body swapping to be available to the public!"

Mr. Tramp turns to you. "What about you? Are you prepared to give birth to a child?"
11113212122222.title: Fourth Candidate: Tara Evans

The machine struggles under the weight of your body, but after it has time to cope, you feel yourself being pulled out of your body. Upon standing up, you feel the weight of your newly aquired bust, which felt very alien. Despite this, veronica felt normal, you were almost conivced she was a....

Most of her family were already deceased by this time, but after the incident, she isolated herself ftom anyone she new, and even quit her job here! a few months down the line, i told her i could fix her memories, and her skin, but she just declined!"

"If she declined, then why did she come in for the swap?" you asked
"I belive that wished to be able to venture out in the day again, something which she beleived she could not do in her current form, you can imagine my suprise when she answered that ad! She did willingly help you with your experiment, after all. Begrudgingly, you agree, and your mother wastes no time.

"Yay! Thanks mom," she winks at you, "I'm gonna' go hang out with my friends!" Your mom skips off, and you're left mortified.
112.title: You & Mom

1121.content:
Well, what're gonna do now? Your mom is off having fun as you, and you're stuck as her. Even worse, you're an adult, and have new found responsibilities. But, forgot about those, you should at least try to have fun as your mom.

"Well, let's go look at mom's clothes!" you think. You figure that you're a woman now, might as well act like one. You walk into your parent's room and head for the bathroom where your mother's closet is. Her closet is incredible, it's about as big as your room. She has tons of clothes, honestly, too many clothes. You look through all of her dresses and blouses and pants and skirts. After about fifteen minutes of looking, you feel exhausted.

"I can't even imagine shopping, then," you say to yourself. You found yourself sitting in the closet, just relaxing. You figure you might as well get up do something. As you get up, you catch a glimpse of your mom in the mirror. You were stunned. You always knew your mother was pretty, but there was something about looking at her through her own eyes. You start to pose in front of the mirror, and enjoy yourself a little.

You think to yourself, "Let's put in something nicer, just to see how I look. I mean, how Mom looks." You start looking through the clothes again and find the perfect outfit. It was difficult to take off your mother's skirt and denim jacket, but you managed. You tried not to look in the mirror with just her bra and panties on, but you caught a small glimpse of it. It took a while, but you finally managed to put on the nicer outfit.

"Man, I make Mom look good," you say to yourself. You can't stop looking at your mother in the mirror. You feel like you can see a different side of her. But, you blow it off for now, and leave the closet a huge mess, for your mom to clean up later.

What now? You look nice, still have plenty of the day left. Maybe do the dishes? Nah, too much work. Vacuum the house? Too hard to set up the vacuum. You decide to just do what YOU would want to do. You go back to the garage and start messing with the machine a bit.

After about six hours of that, you manage to create a mini, portable body swap machine!

"Even as Mom, I still got it!" you proudly say to yourself. You look at the machine, and figure it might be more useful than the original.

Out of nowhere, your father walks in.

"Kim? What are you doing in here, honey?" Mark raised his voice in a friendly manner.

You had to think of an excuse. "Uh, uh, just admiring our son's genius work! It's an uh, a uh, uh, new microwave!" Well, the excuses couldn't possibly work.

"Well, he really is smart. You should start dinner soon, okay?" Mark leaves the garage.

Phew, dodged a bullet there. You sit around wondering where your mom was. You figure she has your cell phone so you call her up. She went out with your friend David, and your friend Jessica. You ask her to come home so you can switch back now. She agrees and comes home. You decide to try to mini machine, and it works like a charm! Your mom cooks dinner, and after you eat, you go to bed for the night. You figure you can use the new mini machine tomorrow even more.

In the morning, you wonder where to use your new machine at. Since it's Saturday, you have all day to play around with it.
1121.title: Continue working on the machine

11211.content:
You decide to go around the neighborhood and mess with the machine. You keep in concealed in your pocket. The machine is made out of a laser pointer. All you have to do is strap it around your wrist, connect it to you, and point the laser at your target. You begin walking down the street, and notice Mrs. Donaldson to your right. She waved at you, and you waved back.

Mary Donaldson is 35 years old, and is still very good looking for her age. She is a vegetarian, and enjoys being outside. She could be classified as a hippie, but doesn't exactly dress like a traditional hippie.

"Hey, Luke, how are you?" Mary asks.

You don't answer, you just pull the machine out of your pocket, and fire at Mary. The process is much longer for the laser rather than the original machine, but still works great. You start to get your vision back, and notice that you're lying on the ground. As you get up, you notice that it is much more difficult because of Mary's skirt.

"Woah, this is incredible!" you hear your voice say. You turn to see that Mary is exploring your body right in the middle of public.

"Mary!" you scold, "Not in public! Here, follow me."

You take her to your house where you show her into your room. You were able to get in unnoticed, but your mom saw who she thought was Mary in her house.

'Mary? What are you doing in here? Who let you in?" you mom asks.

"Oh, Luke let me in," you lie.

"Oh okay, well I'm very busy, and I must be going right now, sorry!" Your mother rushes out the door to God knows where.

You walk yourself out of your house, and explore the world some more from Mary's point of view. For some reason, you were really attracted to Mary, you always thought she was pretty. But, you didn't want to invade her personal privacy. WAIT! That's what she's doing now! You rush back to your house, and into your room, to see that your body is sleeping on the floor. Oh! Mary still has the machine on, as well, you totally forgot about it. You take it off your wrist and try to wake up your body.

"Come on, Mary, get up. I want to swap back," you complain. Mary seems to be coming back to her senses now as she opens her eyes.

"Ugggghhhhh..... Huh, huh? Mary what are you doing here?" your body says. Is this not Mary in your body?

"Who are you?" you plainly ask.

"I'm Erika... I don't know what happened, my dweeb of a brother had a laser pointer, and he pointed at me, and I can't remember anything else..."

"Well get ready, it's going to happen again." You point the laser at your body, and press the button. You wake up, and see Mary's body asleep and snoring. You need to find Erika's body to fix everything up here. How will you find it?
11211.title: Around the Neighborhood

11212.content:
"Where are you going, Luke?" your mom asks as you're heading out.

"Just to the mall."

"Hmm. Be careful. Don't switch bodies with any weirdos. You should really just play with your friends or your siblings. And make sure you ask permission first!"

"Mom..."

"No butts, mister. I'm not going to try and stop you, but I want you to be safe. You're still my kid. If something happens, make sure you let me know so I can help. I'll be able to tell it's you, no matter what body you're in."

"Alright mom... Love you, bye."


Some time later, you get to the mall and start scoping out targets.

There's an old couple power walking through the mall, a lone father with his kid, and a number of bored looking retail employees sitting around in empty shops. The mall is not really the hippest place to find new bodies anymore. Maybe you should go somewhere else instead.
11212.title: Around the Mall

choices: Screw this. Get out of here
112122.content:
You walk into one of the clothing stores, Always 21, and are greeted by a late 20-something woman who clearly didn't expect anyone to come in.

"Oh, huh! Ah Hey! Can I help you find anything?" she asks. You the name Gabby on her name tag.

"Maybe... I'm looking for... someone." you respond.

She laughs a bit. "Well, they're definitely not here. You're the first customer that's come in days. It's just me, trapped in here alone."

"Well, do you want to get out of here for a while?"

"Aha, are you... trying to ask me out? I'm sorry. Maybe if I were your age again!"

"That's not... Here, let me show you!"

You activate the device, and you're looking down at yourself. The switch was a success! Your body just stares back at you slack-jawed. She looks down at herself in your body, and then back to you, and so on. "Wh...What? Why would you want to steal my body??" How did you do this?"

"I'm not stealing your body. I just figured this was the quickest way to explain. I invented a body switching device and I just want to try it out. I wanted to see what its like to be an adult for a while."

Gabby laughs, before realizing you're serious. "Uh, you're going to hate it. I do, but if you really want to, I'm absolutely game. You can switch us back, right? I'll just come back here in a while, after I get my fill of being a kid!" Gabby runs off, leaving you alone in the store in her body.

What will you do while she's gone?

choices: Enjoy this wonderful opportunity, and then return to the store to switch back
1121221.content:
Gabby's heart is racing, but she tries to keep a calm demeanor as she left the store and walked to the other end of the mall as quickly as possible. Who is this kid who just answered her dreams?

Gabby was stuck in a dead-end job and dealing with the stress of getting older without any plan in life. Every day, she wished she could be young and go back to high school again. What were the chances some dumb kid would just show up at work one day and switch places with her? There was zero chance in hell that she was going back to Always 21.

She reached into your pocket, and pulled out the device you had used to switch places with her. She was so glad she managed to pocket it before you noticed. What would she do now?

Thankfully she had his machine, and the controls were very basic for her to understand. She just needed to find some body to switch into, and some way to avoid being traced.

She left the mall as quickly as possible to buy as much time as possible to find a new body.

There was a homeless man with a sign that read, "Will do anything for money." He seemed young, maybe he was a veteran. She could do him one better than money. Maybe if she were in control, she would be able to rebuild his life? Nah, that was too much work. But if she switched with him, before switching with someone else, he would probably be so thankful that he wouldn't rat you out.

There was a father with a baby. She didn't want to go back that far in life, but vanishing into a baby would completely erase her tracks, since the kid could never tell anyone what happened.

There was a young guy, who Gabby recognized from having come into the store before. His name was Terrance, and he was transgender. Though he was doing an amazing job presenting as male, she didn't believe he had any operations or started hormones, since he was still in high school. She could give him a body that was assigned male at birth, and she could probably de-transition in his body if she felt like it.

A teenage girl was sitting outside of a coffee shop nearby. She seemed shy, or at least a bit of a loner. She was adorable, and Gabby instantly fell in love with her body, but she had no plan for keeping her quiet.

Gabby is loaded into the back seat, facing backwards, so she has a little privacy to play with the portable body switching device on the ride back home. The power indicator is very low, since it takes an incredible amount of energy to switch bodies. It could only be used one more time, if she was lucky. The charging port, or what seemed like one, was totally proprietary, so she had no idea how she could charge it up again once it ran out. This was it. One more shot.

When Gabby switched with the baby, she had planned on just growing up that way. She could be an ultra-smart kid, learn to talk almost immediately, be treated like a genius. And with the foresight of having lived life once before, she could do everything perfectly this time. She could be super popular and get into a great school. She'd get an extra 18 years of her life to plan her career this time.

Something was wrong, though. She kept thinking about how your body got up and walked off. It was as if the baby in its new body had adapted to adulthood almost instantly.

Gabby had an awful headache, and felt pressure in her head. It was becoming difficult to remember certain aspects of her life, and certain, baby-like impulses were asserting themselves in her head. She was pretty certain the baby's physical brain couldn't hold on to all of her accrued adult knowledge, and it was bleeding out. If she stayed in this body, she was going to lose everything that made her her. She'd really be starting over from the beginning with no cheats.

When they arrived home, Gabby was put down for a nap. She'd managed to sneak the device into her crib, since the dad was frustrated and distracted, and the room was dark. She was certain it would be found and taken away once someone came in to check on her.

It takes all of her willpower to remain awake and cause a ruckus that might get someone to come in.

The father of the child comes in and checks on Gabby in the crib, and she wastes no time activating the device to escape. She headed to the bathroom to check herself out. She'd become a man, obviously, only slightly younger than she had been, if that. He had a messy beard, clearly not deliberate, but due to lack of energy when dealing with a new baby. She could feel all of his exhaustion in this body.

After poking around in his personal belongings, she found out why there was no mother around. She'd passed away during the birth a few months ago. How miserable. Poor thing. He would never even realize his daughter had vanished either. If he was lucky, he wouldn't remember any of his old life at all.

Gabby, now a single father named David, had just laid her new daughter to rest when she heard a knock on the door. As she went to answer the door, she felt a small pang of guilt over what she did to the former David. Overnight, his memories had seemingly vanished, making him an ordinary baby girl, though possibly with a boyish personality, but that won’t become clear until he, or rather she, is much older. While walking to the front door, she examined the body swap device, trying to think of a way to charge it. However, when Gabby opened the door, she froze in shock.

You didn’t think a genius capable of making a body swapping device would actually let someone walk off with said device if they didn’t have a way of tracking it did you?”

“So it’s dead?” Luke said absent-mindedly, before realizing what she said. “Wait, you steal my device and expect me to just accept your deal? It’s mine! I’m taking it back whether you like it or not!”

“I’m a man, and you’re visiting my home. I could either overpower you, forcing you to charge it for me, or call the cops and say you’re an intruder.” Gabby smirked, thinking she had the upper hand.

“Or, I could use any of my countless inventions to force you to give it back to me, maybe even brainwash you.” Luke smirked back.

“Y-you can’t brainwash someone.” Gabby stuttered.

“I built a device that allows people to swap bodies by transplanting their minds, manipulating their minds would be child’s play.” Luke crossed his feminine arms in victory. “No matter what, I’m getting my device back.”

How does Luke respond?

You walk down to the machine and...
1122.title: Go do mom things

Oh no... You see the machine, or what's left of it at least. Your heart sank. The dial was completely busted, the pods were smashed. Who would do this? Why would they do this? Suddenly, reality starts to set in. You're stuck as your MOM. You didn't want to be stuck as your mom, you wanted to be a kid, you wanted to live your childhood. But then, the obvious set in. You could just make a new one! You were in your mother's body, but you still had your conscious and your smarts. One problem, you knew it would take a while. The machine itself took you about two weeks to build, then another week to program.

"Well, shit," you say as your mother. "I'll be stuck as Mom for, like, a month!" You feel some tears building up, but you effectively hold them back. You start to feel enraged, you had to figure out who did this!

"Someone's going to pay."

You notice that whoever broke the machine must have stepped in the fluid, because you see distinct footsteps on the ground leading out of the garage.

"Bingo," you whisper.

You start following the footsteps, one by one. You feel like Sherlock Holmes, you even start to picture yourself with the Holmes hat on! The footsteps gradually lead out of the garage, and to your own front door! You go inside and see someone holding a part of the machine in the living room. Who was it?
11221.title: It's been destroyed!

112211.content:
Erika... your rebellious older sister, a real punk. She envied your brains and always wished she was as smart as you were. It would be her to wreck your greatest invention. She had no clue what she had just done.

"ERIKA!" you scream in a stern mother's voice, "WHAT DO YOU HAVE THERE?"

"Oh, uh, it's nothing, Mom," she covers up.

"THAT WAS MY... er... LUKE'S PROJECT THAT YOU JUST DESTROYED! DO YOU HAVE ANY CLUE WHAT YOU'VE JUST DONE?"

"I didn't mean to! I was just walking through the garage, and ---"

Erika sits there looking guilty, but it seems like she has no regrets for what she has done. She can't even muster up a sorry.


"Why would you do that?" you say, trying to calm yourself.

"I--- I'm sorry, Mom," she says.

"I worked so hard on that," you say, forgetting who you were, "it took so long to finish!" You start to sob, not being able to control your new female emotions.

"Wait... you made it?" Erika asks, "I thought Luke made it."

You can't believe you forgot who you were. "He did, he did. *Sniff* I had nothing to do with it, it was all him," you manage through your sobbing.

"Mom, you're acting weird. You're getting emotional swings..." Erika states. She slowly starts to slink out of the room as you continue to sob.

"That was weird," Erika says as she walks down the hall. She tosses the part behind her, oblivious to who just saw her do throw it.

"What was that?" your mom asks in your body. "I heard some yelling, too. Everything okay?"

"No, Mom is flipping out over nothing."

"Well I'm sure it was something..." your mom says, almost trying to defend you as her, "She doesn't just get mad at anything."

"Well, I broke your machine, so there's that. I don't even care right now."

"Wait, you broke the machine?!"

"Yeah, sorry, so so sorry," your sister smartly replies, 'Who cares? It looked like a piece of junk anyways."

Your mom runs towards you and sees you on your knees sobbing.

"Erika broke the machine!" you say while crying uncontrollably, "And I can't stop crying!"

"That's part of being a woman," your voice says. It was odd to hear that coming from your own body.

"What are we going to do?"

"Assume positions, pose as each other. There is nothing else we can do. Can you make a new one?"

"Yeah, *Sniff* *Sniff* Yeah I can. It might take awhile though. What am I going to do about school?"

"I'll have to go as you, and you'll have to go to work as me. Don't worry, everything will be okay."

You stand up and hug your old body. You feel a bit relieved. You're glad that you're going through this experience with your mom. She's a strong individual, and always knows how to solve a problem. The both of you had no idea that someone was watching and listening the whole time. Erika. She knew about what was going on now. In fact, she thought it was funny. She felt proud of herself, being able to stick it to you, and your mother.

"Now, honey," you mother says, "You're me for the time being, you'll need to do what I do. I need you to go buy groceries." She hands you a one hundred dollar bill and her car keys. "Here's a list of everything you need. Nothing more, nothing less, got it?"

You nod, still wiping the tears from your eyes.

"Go change, though. I don't want to be seen around town in that outfit," your mother says.

You nod, and head off to your mother's room. But, close behind is your mom.

"I don't trust you picking out clothes," she says. She goes in the closet, and thirty seconds later she returns with the outfit in her hands. "Just leave on my bra and my underwear, and slip into this."

You felt a little odd as you slipped off your mother's sweatpants and dirty t-shirt. She was watching you like a hawk while you undressed and dressed. She picked out a reddish tank top with a khaki skirt. She also grabbed some flip flops.

"Nothing too fancy, not yet at least," she says.

You had trouble getting her breasts not to fidget about in the tank top, but she did not help you. "I want you to learn how to do all of... this," she claims.

It took a while, but you finally finish. Your mom thought it would be a good idea to take a picture, and you have no idea why. You smile anyways, and tilt your hip like your mom would.

A formerly sweet, old lady was transformed into a youth-hungry monster, and then condemned to live the rest of her life as a rodent, crawling through the sewers. You felt guilty for what you did, considering it was your fault she turned into that. On the other side of the coin, her body died, and only you, your father, Erika and Kathy know that it wasn't her who died. More concerning is that your grandmother had been relatively healthy for an old woman. She was old, but active. There were no signs that she was on her deathbed. It was undoubtedly your machine that quickly sent that body down the path to a quick death. Was it because she was old, and the shock of a mind transfer was too much? Or was death an unanticipated side effect of the process?

Your first hand experience with the machine, coupled with your Dad's body swapping war stories had sucked all of the pride right out of you. When you wake up, you're going to pull the plug.

That was the plan, however, when you wake up, your nightmares have come true. You're bound and gagged. Blindfolded and unable to see. You can feel the cold air against your skin. You're naked. When you move, something on your chest bounces dramatically. You have breasts. There's an added weight on the back of your head. Your hair is long enough to tickle your back. While you slept, you definitely switched bodies with a woman. But who? Only your family and Kathy should know about the machine, and you don't think any of them would do something like this.

By struggling, you manage to get your hands loose, and untie yourself, ditching the blindfold and gag. In the dimly lit room, you confirm your suspicions of having become a woman, though you can't tell who it is. She's well developed, probably around 20 years old, and has black hair down to her breasts. You find a light switch, and turn it on revealing your location as what appears to be a college dorm. This room is a single, but it seems to be a shared suite with two other students, who you can hear outside in the common room.
1521211121121.title: The Morning After

15212111211211.content:
Let the record show, that there's no way this was not an accident, and most definitely a malicious, power play. Before stuffing your body in that closet, your snatcher took special care to lock the room, remove any mirrors or forms of identification that you could use to identify your body. All of the clothes had been removed from the room, too, in case you did want to make an escape somehow. She doesn't want to be identified, when she switches back. Which calls into question her motivations. She's definitely using your body for something she can't, or does not want to do in her own. She's probably going to commit a crime in your body, and then switch back into hers and get off free while you get punished for it.

You can't let her get away with this. You knock against the door of your dorm, hoping her roommates aren't in on this operation. "Hello? Anyone out there?"

"Cara? You're in there? What's going on?" A man and a woman answer you, and you can hear them fiddling with the padlock.

"I wish I knew, guys. I think I'm locked in from the outside, and I have no clothes. Can I borrow something?"

About fifteen minutes later, they break the lock and let you out. The girl gives you a sundress, and some underwear when she realizes you don't even have that. They have all the same questions as you, but you avoid answering them. You wouldn't want to incriminate yourself for when you get back to your body. If it's not already too late, that is.

You have the girl's name, and her dorm number at the college campus. That's a little bit of info, but you still don't know who she is, or what her motivations are. You can either search the campus, or head back to your house to see if you can find any clues.
15212111211211.title: You & Cara Wayne

152121112112111.content:
Searching the campus would prove futile, so you head home. You know Cara wanted her body back, and apparently she knows where you live, so when she realizes you're missing your home would be the first place she'd check- if she's not already there. Fortunately, the campus isn't too far from your house, so you're able to walk all the way there in under two hours. When you get there, you easily sneak inside through a secret entrance you'd built in the garage. Your tunnel leads you inside, right behind the body switching machine, hidden from sight. You can hear someone arguing in the front of the pods.

"Erika... I. I don't even know what to say to you. How could you do that? How could you do that to me?"

"This is what I get for telling you the truth. I should have just kept my mouth shut, like you. Or were you planning on telling me about Jeremy. Did you want me to find out on my own when we switched back?"

"That's different, Erika! I'm a married man!"

"So it's okay for you to do that with another guy as long as you're in someone else's body, right? Fucking hypocrite!"

"Erika! Watch your language!"

"Excuse me? You took advantage of me like that, and you think you can order me around? Like I have any respect for you left? Give me one good reason why I should even switch back now!"

"Well, Erika, maybe we should- Who's there!?"

You emerge from behind the machine. "Don't worry, it's me, Luke." Your father and sister, apparently still in each others bodies, exchange confused looks. "When I woke up this morning, I was tied up in this girl's dorm room. You wouldn't happen to know anything about that, would you?"

Your sister's face becomes bright red, "Uh. I. Uhm."

Your actual sister clenches a fist, and punches your dad in the arm. "This deadbeat went to a college party in my body last night. He probably got drunk and blabbed about the machine to someone. We'll be right back, Luke. Daddy and I are going to step into the other room and finish this conversation." Your sister and father head into the den. You hop on the computer and bring up the records of the machine's use from the past 24 hours. The machine's core is still in place, thankfully, so the machine is operational. All of the data for the Grandmother incident is accounted for, and... Six additional swaps have occurred since then, spread out over several hours. You slam your head against the desk as you realize you're not going to be pulling the plug on the machine today.

When your sister and father return, your sister makes an announcement. "We've decided to stay this way for a while."
152121112112111.title: Father Daughter Bonding

1521211121121112.content:
"Whatever... Do what you want. I made up my mind, I'm unplugging the machine and destroying it forever. Not counting the two of you, the machine has been activated five times since we got home yesterday. When I get everyone back to normal, I'm destroying the machine. So you better be ready to switch back before then."

Your father begins to reprimand you for speaking to him like that, but stops himself realizing he's in the wrong. "How do you plan on figuring out who used the machine?"

You ignore him for a moment, while you finish typing in a new line of code for the machine. "In the likely chance that more shenanigans come up while we're trying to fix this, this new programming I just installed has given the machine the ability to identify who used the machine going forward. I'd like you guys to check in on Mom, Kyle and Kathy to make sure they're all themselves, and anyone you can think of that might have wandered in here... Make sure everyone we care about is okay."

Your sister, shrugs your dad's shoulders, "Good luck with that, Dad and I-" You shoot your sister an evil eye that makes both of them flinch. "Okay, okay. I'll check on Kathy. Dad, you check on mom and Kyle." Your sister leaves to check on her friend, which might go kind of awkwardly in your dad's body, but that gives you a chance to talk to him.
1521211121121112.title: "...Whatever."

15212111211211121.content:
"What can you tell me about last night, after I went to bed?"

"Well, we couldn't sleep, so your sister and I started watching a movie. Freaky Friday, ever seen of it?" He smirks at you, and you roll your eyes. "We started arguing about who has it easier and-"

"Are you serious? After yesterday? After everything you went through when you were my age?"

He blushes a little. "Luke... I... After all that. I got a small taste of it again yesterday. It brought the craving back. Within family, we should be okay.Just for a day or so..."

"I really don't care. If the two of you want to be each other for a day or for the rest of your lives, I don't care. My concern is getting my body back, and making sure no one had their bodies stolen against their will. I need to know anything you can tell me about the girl that stole my body."

Your dad tells you about the party, when he was there, someone must have slipped him something. He remembered Cara asking him a lot of questions after he let slip about the machine, and she followed gave him a ride home. She must have followed him in afterwards, but he didn't know why she would have targeted you. A few other people were in the room when he let the beans slip.

After your father goes to check on your mother, you lean back and look at the machine, cursing yourself for ever building it. At this point, you realize you have nothing on you. Your sundress has no pockets, you have no wallet. No cellphone. There's no way for your father and sister to reach you. You consider going up to your room to change into some men's clothes but decide against it. Instead you go to your sister's room, and take one of her bags. "When in Rome..."

Back in the garage, you consider. what you can do. You don't have any clues about where she might have gone, so you really only have two options. Wait for her to come back here, or wait for her to return to her dorm.
15212111211211121.title: "What happened last night?"

choices: You remember where her dorm is
152121112112111211.content:
You aren't comfortable leaving the machine alone, so you hang back, and start programming a locking mechanism to prevent mischief. You're programming away so furiously that you don't even notice someone come in behind you and wrap their arms around you.

"You're a weirdo, bro. You turn into a smoking, hot girl, and you're still just sitting in on your computer. Love the dress, though."

"Kyle! How could you tell it's me?" He just gestures toward you and smirks," Okay, okay. Well, I'm glad to see you're still yourself." You fill him in on the situation, and what you plan to do. For once, he seems to be taking things seriously. Unlike your father and sister.

"I'll stay here and wait for her to come back and watch the machine. Take my phone, and head back to the university. You talk to people she knows, and see if you can find any clues. From what you told me, it sounds like she was cautious about making sure you couldn't do anything while you're in her body, so I think she'll try and switch back. Find out what you can, and try to maintain her life, keep everything in order, just in case."

"Just in case? She stole my body, I don't care about making things easy for her after we switch back."

Kyle's expression changes, and he grabs your hand. "Just in case you need to stay in her body." Your heart drops. "She went to great lengths to keep you in the dark, Luke. She might be using your body to murder someone, or do something horrible, leaving you with the consequences. Do you want to go to prison for her? Or if she cripples your body? If she does something irreversible, I think you should stay as you are."

Kyle's suggestion bother's you tremendously as you drive (in Kyle's car) back to the school. After everything that had happened, how could you even consider not returning to your own body? At the same time, you couldn't just let someone else walk free while you took the fall. If it came to that, you thought about presenting your own body switching machine as evidence in court. That could go very badly too. You try to push it out of your mind for now, as you pull into a guest parking space and begin your investigation.
152121112112111211.title: Kyle's Home

1521211121121112111.content:
You find your way back to the dorm, and knock on the door, since you don't have a key. The door opens, and you strut in like you owned the place.

"Cara! Where have you been? What is going on?"

You shrug, not having come up with a story. "I think I got into some trouble at that party last night. I must have met someone that's bad news. I can't really remember anything." She sits you down on the couch in the common area and tries to probe you for answers. Names, if you were raped. Anything, but you just keep telling her you don't remember, when suddenly, something just hits you and you start crying your eyes out. This is so frustrating, and you're not sure if everything is going to work out after all. The girl, whose name you don't even know, comforts you while you cry.

You start to feel exhausted again, and realize you haven't eaten. You excuse yourself to Cara's bedroom, but your roommate asks you one last thing. "Your clothes and a bunch of your stuff was stashed under the sink in the kitchen. I think I know the answer, but do you remember why?" You shake your head, and grab the bag, dragging it into Cara's room. Jackpot!

You dump it all out, sorting the clothes away, until you find the personal belongings. Personal documents, pictures, class schedules, her purse. You send your brother a message, letting him know you've found some leads. While you wait for him to message you back, you decide that you should give your roommate her dress back, and put on some of Cara's clothes. You pull out some jeans and a t-shirt, but when you pull off the dress, you look at yourself in the mirror and say, "Woah." You think back to earlier when Kyle made fun of you for acting like yourself while stuck in such a hot body...
1521211121121112111.title: College Life

15212111211211121111.content:
This is so cliche. What am I doing? Am I some kind of pervert in a fetish book? I need to be better than her. Even if she's the one who started this, you need to respect her privacy and personal space. Bodyswap is not consent. This is offensive to transgender people. I can't believe I'm doing this. I'm a man, goddammit.

You tell yourself these lines over and over while you try on different outfits, and admire the girl's body in varying levels of nudity. Skirts, dresses, tights, different shoes. You have yourself a little fashion fiesta, trying on different combinations of clothing, trying to find something that looked just right. You lose yourself in it, for what you couldn't tell, was a few hours. When you finally find something you like, a tiered skirt, tights and a simple blouse, you feel a strange level of satisfaction on the same level as when you finished the machine. You lean back on the bed, and doze off, with a smile on your face. You hadn't felt so relaxed since you finished the machine.

A few hours later, you wake up, and scramble for your phone when you realize what you've done. It's dead! Crap! You find a phone charger, and thankfully it matches Kyle's phone, but it needs to charge for a few minutes before you it will power back on, so you finally decide to hit their kitchen and eat something.

Your roommate catches you on the way out, and gives you a hug. "You're looking much better now. Remember anything?" You just shake your head, expecting the conversation to end, but the girl doesn't break free. She just stares at you closely, with a concerned look on her face. She leans closer, staring at you harder and more closely, and then finally forces her lips against yours. Her tongue moves around in your mouth, and you're totally off guard, but within a couple seconds, you're kissing her back, as if this weren't your first kiss.

After what seems like an hour of kissing, the girl breaks away and steps back, smiling at you. "I knew it, you're different today Cara."
15212111211211121111.title: Indulge a little...

152121112112111211111.content:
"I... It's just been a long day. I'm tired," You say, trying to avoid the conversation. You walk towards the kitchen to grab some food. You open the door and wonder what you should eat. If you start eating meat and this girl is a vegetarian, you're toast. Before you can choose anything, a paid of arms wraps around you from behind again.

"That's not what I mean... Cara... What's my name?" she asks, playfully, moving a hand up to your chest, right over your heart, which is beating like a gorilla. You can't even make a guess. She's like a human lie detector right now. She grins, and whispers in your ear. "It's Dawn," and then she gently pulls you over to the couch and sits your down. You're shaking like crazy, and can't resist. "It's okay, relax, relax," she holds onto your hand. "So what's going on?"

You tell her everything. Your real name, about the machine. How your grandmother had turned into a crazed person, and everything you know leading to when you woke up in the dorm room this morning. You were certain that she was only holding your hand so she could check your pulse to know if you're lying, but Dawn doesn't even appear skeptical of your tale. When you finish, she leans up, and kisses you again. "Yeah, that's it. You kiss like a boy. Well, you kissed me at all. Cara would never have let me even hug her, and would definitely never open up to me.

"Dawn, what can you tell me about Cara. I need to get my body back before she does anything terrible with it."

"She's rude, and when she's not out partying like an animal, she locks herself in her room and won't. I can't tell if she's popular or a huge nerd. It's definitely suspicious. It's not weird at all for her to storm out under weird conditions without a word, like you did this morning."

"That just makes me more worried about what she might do... I'm pretty sure she's going to come back for her body eventually."

Dawn is crushed when you say this, but rebounds quickly, lunging at you and pinning you to the couch. "Lucara... I don't want her to come back. I like you better."

"It's Luke..."

"You can't go around using a boy's name, that's suspicious. To everyone else, you're Cara, but to me, You're Lu-cara."

This girl is a little loopy. But you've never had a girl this close to you, or this into you.
152121112112111211111.title: Dawn

choices: Accept that you might be Cara for a while, let her put the makeup on you.
Refuse, and insist that you have to hurry to find your body.
1521211121121112111112.content:
Not wanting to ruin this unique bonding experience with such an affectionate girl, you began to relax. Part of you wanted to get out and find your body, but you felt like maybe that could wait a little longer.

"Fine, fine, Lucara, if you insist." You said with a smirk and brushed a lock of black hair out of your eyes, giving Dawn another glance over. "You had a thing for her didn't you? For Cara."

For the first time you saw Dawn blush, the first crack in her composure. Despite being pinned to the couch, you felt like you'd gained a slight advantage.

"N-no... I just wanted to check to see if you were the real Cara, and it paid off." Dawn said, biting her lip.

"So the first thing you do is kiss your roommate who never lets you so much as hug her, the moment you think she might let you?" You asked playfully, gripping her hand with your own feminine fingers. "I think someone had a crush."

She pouted and finally got off of you, sitting down on the cushion just next to you. "It's not a crush, I hated her personality. Like I said, we don't get along at all, and I don't know a thing about her. You on the other hand..."

"-Have her body? I noticed. So it's lust then?" You finish her sentence for her.

She narrows her eyes at you, and sighs. "You really are a dumb guy aren't you?"

Dawn reaches over to your head and begins gently fixing up your black hair which got tussled from being pinned to the couch. She grabs both your shoulders and straightens your posture, staring intensely into your eyes. You notice how her bright green eyes contrast with her light brown hair, and start to wonder what exactly she's thinking. The conversational advantage you had over her was already slipping away, as she continued to elude you. She places one finger under your chin, turning your head up to look straight at her.

She finally smiles, "There, that looks better. Could use some makeup, but I'm sure you have no idea how to apply it. I'll be right back."

You try to protest as she hurries to the bathroom. "Wait! I don't need makeup! I just need to find my body..."

She quickly returns with a bag of makeup supplies, setting it down on the coffee table. As she starts taking things out of the bag, she asks, "And what if you can't? What if Cara doesn't want to be found? You might have to pass as her for quite some time before this is all resolved. If you look and dress the way she does, it will be easier to fool people. If we want to find out what happened, you'll have to talk to people who know how Cara looks and acts."

Dawn had a point, you realized. This might be more long-term than you expected. But you were still conflicted about this whole situation. Dawn seemed to prefer you as Cara, but would she go so far as to try to keep you that way? She didn't seem to have malicious intent, but then again, you still knew very little about her.

15212111211211121111121.content:
With Dawn looking at you intensely, and holding a makeup brush in one hand, you gave in. "Alright, alright, you've made your point. Lay it on me."

You saw her crack a smile just before you winced and closed your eyes. But she made a noise which caused you to open them again. She said, "No, no, I want you to watch in the mirror, so you will have some idea how to do this yourself next time."

She handed you a large makeup mirror, and you saw Cara's cute face looking very uncomfortable back at you, wearing no makeup. You sighed and watched patiently as she explained all the steps to you. It went quicker than you expected, and within minutes the girl in the reflection definitely looked prettier and more cleaned up. Any blemishes on Cara's skin were no longer visible, and her eyes popped out more.

"Wow... it looks so much better, but it's like you didn't put anything on at all." You said as you studied your new reflection.

She seemed pleased with herself, "Of course, I hope that's something I hope you remember about girls who wear makeup. The best looks are the ones that look like you didn't even try. But you can see the difference right?"

"Absolutely... so why was this necessary again?"

"Well to tell you the truth, it really wasn't. But it will help you not draw attention to yourself. Cara's friends might start to ask questions if she shows up to a party looking like she just rolled out of bed. If you know how to make yourself a presentable Cara, then that's one less thing to worry about." Dawn explained as she began packing the supplies back up again.

You took another glance at yourself in the mirror you held in your hand, and noticed you'd been smiling for the first time since your swap. "Wow, Cara's quite pretty when she smiles." You said out loud.

Dawn chuckled and took the mirror out of your hands, "I know, right Lucara? The real Cara never smiles around me, so it's nice to see you in a good mood now. Just don't let it go to your head!"

She surprised you with another kiss to the lips, pulling away slowly with a mischievous look in her eyes. "I have a feeling you're going to leave, so I wanted to do that one last time."

"How did you- Well yeah I guess I was thinking about it..." You trailed off, being reminded that you really should try to get on Cara's trail, and contact Kyle. But a part of you had your mind on other things, "But it doesn't have to be the last time."

You put your arm around Dawn, giving her waist a gentle tug and returned the kiss. You looked away awkwardly afterwards, "I should call my brother... he's been looking out for clues."

She looks almost disappointed at this, but nods in agreement. "Sounds like you have a plan then, that's good... You know you can come back here at anytime, Lucara. I mean if you need a place to sleep, there's always a bed open. I-I mean Cara's bed! But I mean not that I-" Dawn stammers through her sentence, stopping herself before she said anything stupid.

You give her a pleasant smile with Cara's face, and she relaxes slightly. "It's ok Dawn, thank you."

1522.content:
"Hey Grandma, how's it going?" Erika asks. She notices the machine near your grandma and sighs. "You should stay away from anything Luke made. It's probably dangerous."

"Nonsense, my dear. Your brother is so smart and talented. If he made it, it's certainly amazing, no matter what it is! Go ahead, sit down!" After beckoning your sister to sit in the other pod, your grandma goes ahead and presses the activation button. A bright light emits from the pod, and electricity courses through her body, until her consciousness begins to fade out. It's too much for her to handle, and she a brief moment, she wonders if this might be the end.

When she finally wakes up, your grandmother is relieved that she seems to be okay. The door to the pod swung closed, so that must be why no one found her. Through the window of the garage, she sees its gotten dark. "Erika!!" she remembers your sister, and climbs out of the pod quickly to check on her, but she's not there. Actually, the empty pod is the one which she had been in when she passed out. The one she had just stepped out of is where Erika had been. "Is this a teleporter?"

After hearing her own, young voice, she figured it out immediately, and found a mirror. "Oh lord, I've become my granddaughter. But where is she?"

Your grandma rushed down the hallway, when she reached the dining room. You, Kyle, your mom and father were all sitting down and enjoying dinner. Greasy, spicy, gassy, delicious tacos, that your grandmother had been unable to enjoy for many years now.

"It's nice of you to join us, Erika," Your dad said in a sassy tone. "Sit down, eat." Your grandmother obeyed and began to enjoy food which she had missed dearly.

What kind of dinner conversation does she bring up?
1522.title: Grandma/Your Sister

She gets sucked into Erika's plans for the night
15221.content:
"Where's Grandma?" your grandmother asks boldly.

"I brought her home a little while ago," your mother responds. "Grandma fell asleep in the garage this time. She must have been exhausted."

"Did she... seem okay? Say anything weird?"

"She was still really sleepy. Nothing too out of the ordinary. I think she was talking to herself about one of her sci-fi novels, but she wasn't really with it. I just put her to bed."

"I see." Your grandmother decided to stay quiet for now. It would look really bad if they found out she had switched with her granddaughter. Anyone would think she was trying to steal a new, youthful body. She was relieved that Erika was safe.

She relished in this dinner with her family. You and Kyle made jokes, and your parents joined in. Everyone talked about their days in earnest. No one was trying to dumb anything down for her, or try to avoid difficult subjects that they assumed she was too old to handle. When she came over for dinner it was always so... proper and up-tight. This was truly real.

Sadly, it came to an end soon enough, and the family dispersed. It was late at night.

It's nearly 9:00pm. So late! Your grandmother, Charlotte, decides it would be for the best to retire for the night and go get Erika back in the morning. She had a lot of freedom in her retirement community, but also a lot of restrictions too. It would be way too strange for a teenager, let alone one that has Erika's appearance, to show up unannounced and try to take an old woman out at this hour. If Erika was even awake, of course. Charlotte had a lot of trouble staying up this late.

All this black... and Pink hair!" She rustled her fingers through her vibrant, colored hair. She admired the bold makeup.

"I have to admit, I always felt a little embarrassed to be around Erika when she was dressed up like this, but I think I understand now. I look... "Awesome," as Erika would say!" Charlotte couldn't stop smiling, and did a twirl, causing her skirt to lift up and twist about.

Having gone to bed so early, for Erika, Charlotte woke up extra early the next morning. She needed to go get Erika so she could switch back.
152211.title: Grandma retires for the night

Charlotte really wanted to try and wear more of Erika's punk style, but she wasn't really confident she could do it properly. As she tried on a few of her more... intense pieces of clothing, she immediately felt a little embarrassed, so she gave up. She wanted to respect her granddaughter's image, but she was also feeling a tad selfish, and decided to go with more traditional clothing. She found some clothes she had bought for Erika, tags still attached, of course, and borrowed a few things from her daughter's closet as well.

She wore a long skirt, and a well-ironed blouse. The pink hair threw off the look quite a bit, but she was able to put it up in a way that still looked mature. Charlotte had managed to age Erika up quite a bit, so it wouldn't look nearly as suspicious when she picked up her body.

Charlotte went downstairs, and was showered with compliments about how nice she looked from your mother. As she was about to step out the door, a hand from the garage yanked her inside.

"Okay, who are you, and where's the real Erika?" you interrogate.

Your grandma smiled, "I guess this is a bit obvious. It's me, your grandmother! Erika and I were admiring your machine yesterday, and I, a bit foolishly, turned it on. By the time I woke up, your mother had taken Erika back to my home in my body. I'm on my way to go bring her back now."

You're annoyed that someone had used your machine before you, but you were probably going to try it on Erika anyways. "Well, Grandma... What's it like? How did it feel? Any side effects?"

"Oh, Luke, it's so wonderful! I've been able to see the world from Erika's perspective for once! I feel like I already know her so much better. Thank you for giving me a chance to walk in her shoes for a bit!"

"Uh... I meant more like.. Well, whatever. Just get her back here and switch back. You can activate it again by yourself, right? Change back, and that's it. Actually, maybe you should wait and let me do it for you..."
