You don't really care about what children think, but getting bullied again for the next twelve long years of school sounds like a nightmare you don't want to relive. In that moment, you resolve yourself. You're not just going to be twice the scientific genius you were before. You're also going to be popular. Maybe there's some way you can use your intelligence and maturity to win over your classmates instead of creeping them out.

You stand up and calmly walk towards Billy. The boy recoils a little, expecting you to start fighting back.

"Do you want me to teach you how to read too? You don't have to be jealous."

"jello? What are you talking about, stinky brain?"

"I can teach you, if you want. You can just ask. You don't have to pick on everyone else just because they're so cool." Billy turns red, and you hear murmurs from the rest of your classmates. Apparently calling everyone 'cool' had won you a lot of points, way faster than you anticipated. Kids are pretty pure. "Come on, Billy. Let's be friends!"

From that day onward, you had flipped the script and managed to make quick friends of most of the kids in your class.

You advance in school, until the day your genius is recognized, and you're given the opportunity to skip a few grades.
155331221211.title: Outsmart Billy

1553312212112.content:
You could easily skip a few grades, but you don't really see the point. Fifth grade would be as easy as Third grade and as easy as first. You could just keep jumping ahead until you caught up, but being a little kid in high school or college would lose its impact pretty quickly. You decide to stay where you are, and instead, enjoy the perks of an easy child's life.

While your new friends can't engage you on your level, you do find them kind of cute. And they like you, a lot. As the years pass, you expand your circle of friends, and teach your fellow kids about science and reading and all the things that should be ahead of them. While not on your level, your friends end up being smarter than average. Maybe they'll make good lab assistants someday.

Someday, being the key word. Your old family was pretty well off. The Jacobs, on the other hand, were pretty poor. Turns out having 5 kids is really expensive. Your new siblings were always disappointed that they were stuck with hand-me-downs and didn't get the gifts they hoped for, but you understood, and tried not to ask for too much. That science lab you wanted wasn't really on the table, so your ability to build and invent was hampered. You already had the design for a new body switching machine, but it was financially out of your reach. All you could do was hope that nobody else figured out the technology before you were able to rebuild it.
1553312212112.title: Advance Normally

choices: Go see how your old family is doing
15533122121121.content:
When you got a little older, something you had taken for granted really set in. You're a girl now. You got the kids to knock it off with cooties and nonsense like that pretty quickly, but as a kid, being a girl wasn't too much different, except for the missing equipment. When you hit puberty though, you had to deal with growing breasts, periods, and swirling hormones that really threw off the way your brain worked. You became a lot closer to Ms. Jacobs at this point, now that she finally had things to teach you.

You learned about feminine care and makeup. Hair care. You never expected to be interested in any of this, as a boy in a girl's body, but it just came naturally with growing up. Every once in a while, you'd look in the mirror and wonder who this stranger was, like it had only just now set in that you were in someone else's body. It wasn't anyone else's though. It had literally been yours since the moment you were born.

You were 13 now, and you were definitely a girl. You're only a few weeks away from the end of middle school, and the start of high school. You've nearly caught up to where you were in your old life, but oh, how things have changed.
15533122121121.title: To Middle School

155331221211211.content:
You wake up in your bed as the sunlight just starts to peek into your room. It's Sunday. Though you're tempted to stay in bed and sleep late, you hop out of bed and start your morning routine. You throw on your workout clothes and go for a run. Eat breakfast, shower, throw on a comfortable outfit ( a modest dress, tights and a cardigan) do up your makeup and plop yourself down at your desk by 8am. One of your flaws from the old life was not taking proper care of your body, and you weren't making that mistake again. Just because you were a science nerd didn't mean you had to be sweaty, out of shape and sloppy.

Your bedroom was neat and tidy, but cluttered. Your bed was tucked tightly in the corner near your three bookshelves. You had a dresser and a closet and a stand dedicated to makeup and cosmetics fitted with a big mirror. You had two desks in the room. One of them was fairly new, which held your computer and most of your school-related materials. The other desk, had been thrown away by your neighbors, which you took home and restored. It had belonged to "Luke," before he'd been... Well, you know. This desk was littered with screws and tools and scientific gizmos you'd been working on.


Your older sister Sally, now 18, appeared in your doorframe half-dressed, and half-awake. "How are... Yaaaaaawn... How are you already up this early on a Sunday, Tara? Are we even related?" Sally rubs her eyes and leans against the frame of the door for much needed support.

"We only get one life, Sally... I want to make the most of it." After you say this, Sally rubs her head and looks a little flustered, as if she were under attack. "I love you, sis. If you're happy, keep doing what you're doing. What's right for everyone is different, and that's ok. I just don't want to have any regrets."

Sally swoops in and hugs you, and you return her gesture. "God, Tara. You're 13. How did you get so mature?" She pauses briefly. "Well, actually, you were the most mature one of us from the day you were born. You barely even cried. You were speaking in complete sentences at a year old when I was still going to speech therapy."

Hugging Sally tight, you respond, "I'm sorry if I made it harder on you. I wasn't trying to make you look bad, I just... I was eager to grow up, I guess."

Sally bops you on the head and heads back toward the door. "Don't worry, I'm not upset. I love you too, sis. But GOD. We're sisters, we're supposed to fight. I'm not supposed to get consoled by my preteen sister... You could do with a lazy day once in a while, though. You're always buzzing around, trying to please everyone and do everything. Take some time for yourself, okay?"

Sally leaves, and you consider what she said. Your phone is already full of notifications from at least six different people that all want to do something with you today. Having a lot of friends was surprisingly high maintenance. "Maybe I will take a day for myself."
155331221211211.title: Sister Sister

1553312212112111.content:
You post online that you're taking a day to yourself, and ignore everyone's messages. It was time to get to work. It was so difficult to find time to work on your science projects lately. Two of your siblings had moved out, and the others were all old enough now to pitch in, so finances in the Jacobs household were much better than they had been when you were born, so your parents have started spoiling you a bit more. They were more than happy to help you excel in any way they could.

Yet time was so limited. Keeping up with your new friends and classmates was really important to you, so you couldn't neglect them. On top of all that, by the time you were done with school work, your (self-imposed) early bedtime was already upon you. It was hard to even get an hour in per day.

You were going to spend all day working on something, but you'd still have to spend your time wisely. You had a few projects in progress.

The first one, you had technically been working on since before you were reborn. It was the body switching device, with a brand new model to accommodate your conditions. It made you feel slightly uneasy.

The second, was a mind reading device. The technology used to switch minds, by its very nature, would have to read them in some form in order to rearrange them. In science fiction, mind reading machines would often accidentally trigger body swaps, so it was only natural that you would reverse engineer the technology.

The third project, well, you weren't quite sure what it would be just yet.
1553312212112111.title: Tinker with your inventions

15533122121121111.content:
You probably could have finished the body switching machine a while ago, but an anxiety gripped you whenever you worked on it. As a scientist, you couldn't NOT rebuild it, but as someone who had rebuilt their life from the ground up, its existence kind of scared you.

What if someone misused it, and stole the life you've made for yourself? If people could steal bodies from each other, it could be catastrophic.

What if everyone figured out that you had switched bodies with Mrs. Jacob's baby 13 years ago? You don't really know why your new mother was even in the garage that day. What if she already knows? Once the technology is complete, would you have a moral obligation to switch back into your old body?

In spite of your hesitation, you can't stop yourself from rebuilding the machine. It's part of your legacy.

You work on it all day, with inspiration taking hold. It's almost as if you were still working on it yesterday, when that was more than 13 years ago. What kind of design do you go with?

A stationary pod-based design. It wouldn't have to worry about power, and could be fixed more easily if something broke. You could try to secure it, but there wasn't enough space in your room, so you'd have to place it somewhere else.

or

A portable device. The convenience of bringing it anywhere can't be beat, but the drawbacks are severe. It takes a lot of power to switch bodies. It would no doubt run out of juice, break, and get stolen at the least convenient times for cheap drama.
15533122121121111.title: Redesigning the Body Switching Machine

155331221211211112.content:
The Pod design you used before was stable, but it was nearly impossible to keep anyone else from finding it. Accidents would no doubt happen. You're still convinced that's the better design, but you could wait until you had a more secure location before building that version of the machine. For now, a portable design would prove you can still get the technology working. You had some ideas in mind to deal with all of the potential problems that could arise.


You work on the device all day, without too much interruption. Your dad offers to go to the store to pick up some parts you need, and your mom makes you lunch while you work. By sundown, you have a supposedly working prototype ready to go on your desk. Once you started working, you were in a trance. You got more work done than should have been possible.

You build the decide into the shell of an old smartphone, stripping out most of its features except for the screen, the cameras, and the internet connectivity. This time you've gone with a "Point and Shoot" style, where you essentially snap a picture of the two people you want to swap, and it does it. There was a front facing camera for quick and instantaneous swapping of yourself. It used a lot of power, so it could only be used two or three times before it needed a charge, but any old phone charger would work this time.

You hadn't finished the programming yet, but the device would use the internet to save records of every swap that had been performed, taking pictures, recording sound, and performing a light mind-scan that could create a Mind Identification Number (MID) that could be used to consistently keep track of which mind was in a body without any nonsense.
155331221211211112.title: Portable Design

choices: Someone else gets to it first
1553312212112111121.content:
You're still anxious about the body switching device, so you don't run any tests on humans yet. You do some experiments on animals, and continue to tweak the design and programming. You move it into a more innocuous shell, install a physical component that can be used to trigger swaps, in case you got stuck as someone or something that couldn't activate the camera, and finish the programming so it would be absolutely safe. You also come up with a genius failsafe to protect against breaks, theft and errors: You built three of them. So even if the worst case scenario happened, you had two backups secretly tucked away.

You worked on the device over time, never really getting too many whole days you can dedicate to the project again. As you enter High School, your schedule only becomes more jam-packed. You continued your crusade for popularity, trying to stay on great terms with literally everyone in school. Lots of people came to rely on you for help, including teachers and adults. You were practically forced into student government, becoming the class president. You played a bunch of sports, keeping yourself physically fit, and you had college applications to worry about now. You've officially been Tara longer than you were Luke. The old name doesn't really feel like yours at all.

And you feel exhausted. Your life is non-stop. Becoming a perfect little Mary-Sue with friends, grades, and style took a lot of work, but you felt like you'd really conquered your childhood. Now you needed to conquer your fear, and get your greatest invention in working condition.
1553312212112111121.title: Return to High School

15533122121121111211.content:
So you decided to test it on yourself, but testing a body switching machine requires two test subjects, so who will be the other test subject? You have gotten use to being a girl now, so you’re not sure you want to be a guy again, but it since you’ve lived more than a decade as both genders, becoming a guy again should be okay, though it could be a bit jarring to suddenly be a guy for the first time in years. After all, when you became a girl, you at least started as a baby and were able to ‘grow into’ being a girl, so your transition from male to female wasn’t very jarring. Especially since female children are mostly the same as male children when it comes to their bodies except for the crotch area, which was easy to forget about when you weren’t peeing. However, after going through puberty as a girl, you’ve gotten used to some things you never had as a guy, like having breasts and periods. Switching bodies with a guy could be jarring since you’d go back to not having breasts again, but if you DID switch with a guy, it definitely wouldn’t be your original body.

The infant who was supposed to be born as Tara, but switched into your body before her birth, had slowly learned things about life as an infant would, and now has a teenage mind in an adult body. To everyone else, ‘Luke’ seemed to have suddenly gotten a SEVERE case of amnesia where he forgot literally everything he ever learned including talking and walking, and relearned all of it over several years. ‘Luke’ doesn’t remember being anyone other than ‘Luke’, and believes the amnesia story everyone else believes. If you switched with ‘Luke’ now, he might not be happy about being a girl, plus you aren’t too keen on having your old life now that it’s pretty much been turned upside down.

So if you switched with a guy, it would probably be a classmate, such as your old bully, now close friend, Billy. You don’t know for sure, but some of your friends say he developed a crush on you during your late elementary school years, so he would be thrilled to be in your body. It might not be a good idea to switch with him, since he might violate the body you’ve accepted as yours since it was born, but at the same time, it could be the perfect opportunity to try something you never had the chance to when you were a guy. Having sex with a girl. You’re not sure you should do that though since you have always believed teen sex was a bad idea, but since you’re the girl, and would be the guy during sex, you could make sure it’s safe sex to avoid getting your body pregnant. Plus, it would be fitting to lose your virginity as a guy, as you should have if you hadn’t switched into the body Ms Jacobs baby girl, but at the same time, you’ve put a lot of work into this body, so letting someone else lose its virginity is an uncomfortable thought, even if you’re the one taking its virginity. Plus, Billy might not be keen on having sex with his own body, even if you’re the one in it, and he’s in your body.

Despite that opportunity, you’re still not sure you want to be a guy again, even if only briefly. So perhaps it’s better to switch with another girl. Maybe even your 22 year old sister, Sally. You could trust her with your body, and she can keep your invention a secret, so someone stealing it wouldn’t be a problem. Plus, you could give her the chance to be younger for a short time. Or perhaps your best friend, Alicia. She and you are very similar in personality, but she’s not nearly as smart as you, and you tutor her a lot. You actually really enjoy her company, and she knows pretty much EVERYTHING about you. Except the fact that you used to be someone else of course. Other than that, she knows everything about you, so she cod easily pretend to be you, especially since she’s very good at acting. She secretly wants to be an actress when she’s an adult, and you’re the only person who knows that. So who should be the other test subject? A guy, such as Billy? Or another girl, like Sally or Alicia?
15533122121121111211.title: Test it on yourself

155331221211211112111.content:
You definitely wanted to remain a girl. Being a guy just felt gross to you, and you don't trust any guy inside of your body. There were two people you do trust, though. Your sister Holly, who 22 now, and your best friend, Alicia.

But maybe you should test it out on someone else, instead. You were all very similar, so maybe someone a little more... different from yourself would be a more worthwhile test.
155331221211211112111.title: Girls

15533122121121111212.content:
You wait until Friday to bring the device to school with you, because of course you had to test it out on a Friday. As you head through the school towards your first class you scope out potential test subjects. You wanted two people with very distinct personalities, so you could recognize the results instantly, and have the most fun watching them.

As you open your locker, you hear the most fitting conversation happening just around the corner. It's two of your friends, Alicia and Billy, arguing. Alicia was pretty much your best friend since third grade. She knew most of your secrets, except that tiny one about Luke. You shared almost everything and trust her without question. She's smart, probably due to your influence. Her dream was to be an actress, so naturally she was in the drama club.

Billy had bullied you briefly in Kindergarten, but after you put a stop to that, he turned into your biggest fan. You helped him learn to read, and taught him things all the time. He mellowed out a lot, and wound up becoming another of your close friends. Unfortunately, as you both got older, the hormones set in and his adoration for you turned hard into an unrequited love. You had liked having a guy around, but you never realized how horny they could be until they were interested in you. It's made things a little too awkward lately. Billy is really into movies and film, and runs a video show on the internet called, "The Angry Film Critic" where he reviews mostly bad movies and pretends to get angry about them. You sometimes help him out with it.

Alicia and Billy were both very close to you, but they didn't get along very well. Alicia gets very irritated when he's around. Billy... tried to ask Alicia out when you turned him down. She wasn't having any of that. Today, though, they're arguing about, and you can hardly believe it, who has the harder life. It would be criminal if they didn't swap bodies for a day after spouting out every cliche in the book.
15533122121121111212.title: Picking the friends

choices: "Of course I believe you. I'm the one who switched you."
"Interesting. I'll have to investigate how this is possible."
"Very funny joke, but that's scientifically impossible."
155331221211211112121.content:
Your two friends start to wrap up their argument, and you hurry to pull out the swapping device before missing your perfect chance.

"It's a shame you can't see what it's like to be me, Alicia. I don't just go around begging girls to sleep with me all day."

"Billy, please. I could take your life and make it look like you actually give a shit. If you had to spend a day as me, you'd fail before getting out of bed."

The two turn to walk away, and you get the device out just in time. You use the camera feature to lock on to Billy and Alicia and hit the SWITCH button before they get too far away. Their bodies both freeze in place, and a flash like blue lightning appears between them. You panic a little, because a lot of people in the hallway saw it happen, and you quickly slip the device back into your skirt pocket. You hadn't expected such a flash effect.

Billy's body comes to first. He looks around, grabs a lock of curly hair and then looks down at his body, grabbing onto his thick arms and baggy jeans. Finally he turns around and sees Alicia, and says, "SHIT. NO." That's Alicia for sure.

Billy in Alicia's body has a very similar reaction, but it started and ended with her breasts. Other kids in the hallway had no idea what to make of the cool Alicia fondling herself. Alicia stormed over and ripped her own hand away from his chest. They start whispering to each other, so you can't quite make out what's being said. You wonder if it would be too weird if you went over and said hello, but before long, you clearly hear them say, "We need to talk to Tara."

"Ah, shoot," you mutter to yourself as you duck back around the corner towards your locker.

Billy and Alicia come running up to your locker all flustered, and start telling you about what you had just witnessed. They immediately start telling you secrets and things they think only they could know in a mad panic to try to convince you who they really are. You aren't sure how to play this.
155331221211211112121.title: Alicia and Billy

choices: You have class with Billy in Alicia's body
You have class with Alicia in Billy's body
1553312212112111121211.content:
"Of course I believe you. I'm the one who switched you."

Alicia and Billy initially look shocked, but get over it very quickly. "Oh, of course. That makes sense," Alicia says, and Billy nods in agreement. "No one but Tara could make something crazy like this happen."

"You two were having the most cliche argument in the book. If I hadn't tested my invention on you, an act of God certainly would have. Okay, lesson learned. Hold still, and I'll switch you back."

To your surprise, Alicia speaks up, "Hold on, hold on. You're right. We were asking for it. It would be a waste not to see how this goes, right? Are you really satisfied ending your experiment before I can prove to Billy how easy he has it?"

That's true. You had just figured you should switch them back since you'd been found out. But if they're willing participants, how could you refuse? You look to Billy, and he responds with a nonplussed "Okay."

"Alright," you begin, "Let's lay down some ground rules. First. you can't tell anyone. If anyone finds out about the swap, you won't be able to switch back." You joke, but Billy and Alicia just nod along, taking you completely seriously. "Sorry. body swap humor. But don't tell anyone, because my device is a secret. I'm only telling you because you're my best friends, ok? Second, don't screw things up on purpose or commit any crimes. You need to have some basic respect for each other's lives."

The pair agrees to your terms,but the bell for class rings before you can lay down any more rules. You hope to learn something from them.
1553312212112111121211.title: "Of course I believe you."

choices: Hilda, a girl who saw you use the device
Jerry, a boy who saw you use the device
15533122121121111212113.content:
You don't have any classes with your friends today, unfortunately. It drives you nuts that you don't get to observe the results of your experiment. Every now and then, you hear rumors about Alicia or Billy acting strangely, but you never manage to catch either one of them in time. So disappointing.

At lunch time, you sit and stare at your body switching device, wondering if you should perform another swap on some kids you might be able to observe more easily. Maybe teachers or faculty would be interesting. A student and a teacher... That was a classic idea.

You open the 'camera' mode that initiates swaps, and look around, thinking about who would be an interesting pair to switch. You wanted some people that with very different personalities, but weren't on bad terms or at risk of trying to steal each other's lives. You'd also prefer subjects that would be more likely to keep quiet about the swap than try to tell anyone.

As you're thinking, you're fiddling with the device, and briefly switch to the 'selfie' camera mode, and you see someone else standing in the frame behind you. A hand reaches down and initiates the swap.

Who was it?
15533122121121111212113.title: You don't have class together

155331221211211112121131.content:
Landing in a body that had been leaning over your shoulder, you tumble forward over your own body down the steps you had been sitting on. You aren't hurt but you banged a shoulder on the way down. You see your body start to stand up, and you wonder if maybe you could blame the swap on the fall and hide the existence of your device.

Your body holds out its hands and does the once over, going up and down. You take this as a cue to do the same. You're still a girl, thankfully. Not heavily overweight or deformed in any way that you can see, though, clearly she didn't work out as religiously as you. You were wearing a t-shirt with some Japanese characters on it. You think you recognize this body as your classmate Hilda.

"I knew it," you hear your own voice say, "you're the one that switched Billy and Alicia! I saw you point that old phone at them right before they started acting funny."

"It wasn't as subtle as I expected. I guess I can't deny it. But they-"

You're cut off, "They were just begging for it, right?!" Hilda gives three quick little claps, and hops up and down. "Do you... Do you love body swapping too? Well, of course, you have a body switcher, duh Why else would the amazingly smart, talented and popular Tara Jacobs have one if she wasn't into them too. I mean, you'd never have a reason to want to switch bodies with anyone... Unless... You're someone else that stole her body!?"

Uhh. Not exactly.

"No, I've been Tara since the day I was born." Technically true. "And you're right. I don't want to swap myself with anyone, which is why I experimented on Billy and Alicia. So, if you don't mind switching us back?"
155331221211211112121131.title: Hilda, a girl who saw you use the device

1553312212112111121211312.content:
"Oh... Of course not." Hilda grabs the device off the ground, and packs it into her bag. "I've always wanted to see a body swap in real life. We can't just end it after two minutes. I thought you were as big a fan as me."

Furrowing your brow, you reply, "So, that's it then. You're trying to steal my body?"

Hilda waves her arms in protest. "No, of course not! I don't think I could ever live up to your insane life. You do sports, pretty much run this school, and apparently do mad science on the side. I don't want that life... For more than a day, maybe!" Hilda smiles, and folds her hands together, "Please, please, pleeeaase, just let me have one freaky Friday! I won't tell anyone about it. I just. NEED this. And don't act like you're totally moral here, either. You definitely switched your friends without their permission! You shouldn't experiment on your friends if you're not willing to experiment on yourself!"

Hilda brings up a lot of good points. Should you go along with it?
1553312212112111121211312.title: "Of course not."

choices: See how Hilda is doing at your soccer practice
Fill Billy and Alicia in on the situation
15533122121121111212113123.content:
"Sorry, Hilda, I'm not comfortable with this. Let's switch back and I'll switch you with someone else." You reach for your bag, and Hilda catches your arm. Her grip is tight. The strength of your body surprises both of you. "Hilda!"

"Stop it, Hilda!" she replies. You can see her fighting back a smile. She's loving every minute of this. "This is happening! I'm Tara, and you're Hilda. If you don't go along with it, I'll tell someone about your invention. The police, or scientists. Or some company. Or the internet. I know you don't want this going public yet, so just play along. For the rest of the day... No, until tomorrow, I'm you, and you're me!"

The bell for class rings, and the other students in the lunchroom get up to return to classes, including a few that were staring and watching your weird exchange. You just hoped more people weren't figuring it out already, since Hilda is anything but subtle. She turns to go to class as well, storming off in a feigned anger. Once she thinks she's out of your sight, she literally jumps for joy, and starts to pose.

Hilda doesn't seem malicious, at least. She's probably the best possible person you could have had steal your body. Hilda was just a huge fan of your invention. If things don't go badly, you could probably count on her to help you run further experiments once you swap back. In the mean time, you needed to make sure you didn't do anything stupid that might give her a reason to not want to switch back. You have backup devices locked up in your room at home for situations like this, but the best case scenario, you and Hilda have a lot of fun, collect a lot of data, and switch back without having to resort to any scheming.

When you get to Hilda's next class, math, you're greeted by a test. No problem for you at all. In the next class, science, another test! After that, English, and... an in-class essay. You consider getting answers wrong on purpose, to keep in character, but you end up just acing all of her tests for her.

"Did she switch with me just so I would take her tests for her?" You mumble to yourself after handing in your essay and being dismissed from class. "She had better be happy with her test results..."

Now that classes are over, the experiment can really begin. You're free to wander in Hilda's body.
15533122121121111212113123.title: Hilda's classes

choices: Get some clothes and join in
See if Hilda left the device in your gym locker
155331221211211112121131231.content:
You head out to the soccer field, and are relieved to see your body in attendance. You were worried she might have blown practice off (even though you were considering doing the same when you left the house today). Hilda is... Not doing well... But she's not doing as badly as you anticipated. You watch closely, and it's actually quite fascinating. Certain moves, certain techniques, she pulls off exactly as if it were you out there. Your muscles remember how to play, even if Hilda's mind doesn't. She can't make the same judgement calls that you would, though, so opportunities for her muscles to take over are sparse.

You see something similar happening with your friend Alicia, who is currently Billy in her body, but to a greater level of success. He's more aggressive than Alicia normally is, giving more opportunities for her muscles memory to kick in. He might actually be performing better than Alicia in her own body. You shouldn't tell her that, though.

You're extremely curious how Hilda's body would respond in the same situation, with your experienced mind and her lack of training. You head into the girl's locker room to find some gym clothes.
155331221211211112121131231.title: See how Hilda is doing at your soccer practice

1553312212112111121211312311.content:
You find Hilda's locker, but you don't know the combination. You wonder how Hilda was able to get your clothes out of your locker since you never told her yours, either. You get an idea. You loosen up your grip and your mind, and just let Hilda's fingers do the work. It takes a few tries, and some adjustments, but you're able to open up her locker by tapping into her muscle memory. Fascinating! You couldn't have made these kinds of discoveries if you hadn't swapped yourself.

You change into Hilda's clothes, grab a soccer ball, and start practicing by yourself in the gym. It's... impossible. You know the techniques, but you can't do it. The coordination is off. You can't aim shots. The ball bounces off the wrong parts of your foot. Everything is just, wrong. Some kids on the bleachers actually laugh at you. You knew you wouldn't be able to play like yourself, but you had assumed you could make up for it a little bit with your mind, but your body can't follow through.

You wonder if maybe Hilda has some kind of skills that you could tap into now that you have her body?
1553312212112111121211312311.title: Can't keep up

155331221211211112121131233.content:
Hilda's girlfriend, Rebecca, had been messaging you, rather Hilda, all through the day. You were able to ignore her messages with the justification of testing, but that excuse wouldn't work now. You were out of class a few minutes early, but it was inevitable that you would have to see her. It felt wrong to pretend to be Hilda to one of the people closest to her, but this was part of the deal. You let Rebecca know where you are, and within just two minutes you see her coming straight towards you and-

You're totally caught off guard as Rebecca immediately goes in for a kiss, french style. You obviously don't react in time, because Rebecca pulls back and with a sad look, asks if everything is alright.

"I am," you reply, "Its just... I had a lot of tests today. I'm really tired. I have a lot on my mind."

Rebecca gives you a tight hug. "It's ok. We can talk about it. So, do you want to go to my house or yours? Or maybe some place that will cheer you up?
155331221211211112121131233.title: Meet with Hilda's girlfriend

choices: Roll with it. It’s Hilda’s own fault for stealing your body
1553312212112111121211312331.content:
Since you didn’t know the way to Hilda’s house, you figured you’d have Rebecca take you there. “Let’s go to my place.” You replied.

“Great! Let’s get going then.”

The two of you then started walking, with Rebecca taking a slight lead, unknowingly guiding you. Apparently Hilda lived just a few blocks away, so it didn’t take long to walk there. Once there, you took Hilda’s house keys out of her bag, unlocked the door and headed inside. Once inside, you turned to say something to Rebecca, only to be surprised by another sudden french kiss. “I didn’t see any cars in the driveway, your parents must not be home yet. How about I cheer you up in the bedroom?” She asked with a sexy smile. Your current body felt turned on by her smile, and you found it hard to resist her advances.
1553312212112111121211312331.title: Hilda's house

155331221211211112121133.content:
You're suddenly standing over yourself, and you jolt backwards, creating some distance. Looking down, you confirm that you've become Ms. Anderson, your science teacher. Your body turns around, and gasps. She looks down at herself, and back to you. "Oh my goodness... Ms. Jacobs... What have you done?"

"Now, calm down, Ms. Anderson. When you reached for my phone, you activated my invention by mistake. We've just swapped bodies."

Ms Anderson takes your phone and uses its camera as a mirror. She looks at your face in her reflection. "Incredible. Absolutely incredible. You ARE a genius. You created this? And it's all housed in a portable, mobile shell like this?"

"Yes, I did. I'm not ready to reveal it to the world yet, would you mind keeping it a secret?"

Ms. Anderson's look of stun fades away. "Very well. However, in exchange, why don't you teach my last two classes of the day, and we can switch back after school? I would also like to observe the effects of this body swap myself. What better pair of test subjects could you ask for than a pair of scientists?"

"Well, you're right. And I would like to try my hand at teaching. It's a deal. We'll meet up after class." Ms. Anderson hands the device back to you, and you head off to her classroom.

Once you're gone, a wicked smile creeps onto the face of your body. Ms. Anderson gazes into the mirror once again, and admires your face.

"Oh, Luke. I just knew you were still out there. And you popped up in my class..."
155331221211211112121133.title: Ms. Anderson, the Science Teacher

1553312212112111121211331.content:
17 years ago, when you were still Luke, Professor Michelle Anderson had been one of your self-proclaimed rivals in the field of young science prodigies. When you came onto the scene, it threatened everything she had accomplished. All of her accolades were set to be stolen by you. Until the accident that reduced Luke's mind to that of an infant's.

Michelle knew what you had been working on in your garage, and suspected you might have swapped with someone else, but relished in the opportunity to exceed now that her competition was erased. She went on to be very successful, with numerous inventions to her name.

But when rumors about a new genius child from your neighborhood began to float around, the acclaimed Professor Michelle Anderson surprised the world by taking a teaching job at a High School. It was only a hunch. The talents of this new girl, Tara Jacobs, were wider and far exceeded those of Luke, and the personality was nothing alike, but the thought of her rival making a comeback... The opportunity to shove everything in his face, Michelle couldn't resist.

After several years of school, Michelle was nearly convinced Tara was not Luke, since she seemed to be spreading herself far too thin to actually accomplish anything in science. However, the discovery of your body swapping device was all the proof she could ask for.
1553312212112111121211331.title: The Science Teacher, Professor Michelle Anderson

choices: She reverse engineers her own body switching machine
She finds a way to block herself from being swapped
She discovers a side effect of body swapping
15533122121121111212113311.content:
While you were teaching her classes, Michelle dismissed herself from school, and took your car to drive back to her home nearby. She had a secret lab hidden behind a bookshelf in the living room with all of the equipment she would need. She ran several tests on your body to try and find anything out about your body swapping technology. She also logged your fingerprints and DNA.

While waiting for test results to come back, Michelle performed some physical examinations of your body: push ups, sit ups, rope climbing, coordination.

"Absolutely spectacular. It appears, with hindsight and knowledge in hand, Luke was able to craft a perfect life. Genius intellect. Ideal physical fitness. Playing his peers like a game. Mental, physical and social health. All three pillars." Michelle crushed a can in her hand. "This body is perfect. I wonder why he recreated a machine that might take it away from him?"

"What must it have been like to be reborn? How long did it take to regain all of his abilities? Did he ever struggle to hang on to himself? Wait... Does he even remember? Maybe his mind was absorbed by the new personality entirely?"

Michelle's monologue is interrupted by the beeping of the completed tests. Lots of data is displayed on the screen. How does she use the information?
15533122121121111212113311.title: Michelle's Lab

15533122121121112.content:
Fortunately, despite how incredible it is to invent a body switching machine, you learned your lesson from last time. Body switching machines are dangerous. You don’t want to risk accidentally switching with a baby again, starting over again. There’s also the possibility someone might STEAL your body or machine, and that would be disastrous. Plus, you already built one once, so you could do it again whenever you want. So it would be best to wait until you’ve grown up and lived as an adult for a while before building a body switching machine. Once you’ve actually experienced life beyond the teenage years, you might purposely switch with a baby again so you could continue learning. You could essentially be immortal, switching into whatever body you want to live forever, but for now, you’ll just put it on hold. After all, what’s the point in being a genius if you only make body switching machines and switching bodies? You couldn’t take full advantage of your genius if you just made body switching machines every time you become old enough to be capable of doing it. So you’ll focus on your mind reading device for now.

After a few months, you’ve managed to finish your mind reading device. You managed to make it into a small device you wear on your ear resembling a bluetooth you use for phones. You chose this design so it would be inconspicuous. That way, you could read people’s minds without them even knowing. Especially since you can hide it under your long hair, a perk to being a girl. Sure some guys have long hair, but it looks better on girls. The way it works, or at least the way it’s designed to work, is to read the mind of anyone you’re looking at, and play those thoughts in a small speaker in your ear. Now, all you need to do is test it, to see if it works the way you want it to. However, you need a test subject. In other words, you need to try reading someone’s mind. But who to test it on? Perhaps your older sister Sally. The only problem is, the two of you are really close, despite the 5 year age gap, and reading her mind would be an invasion of privacy. But at the same time, you two are so close, she might not mind it. So if you choose to test it on her, you should probably ask for permission first. You could also just take it to school with you in the morning and try reading the minds of random classmates.
15533122121121112.title: Mind Reading Device

155331221211211121.content:
You knocked on Sally’s door. “Come in.” You open the door, and walk in to see Sally sitting on her bed, texting her friends, and close the door behind you. “Oh hey Tara, what are you doing in here? It’s kinda late you know.”

“Yeah, I know, but I just finished my new device and I was wondering if you’d help me test it.” You explain.

“What device? That thing you’ve been working on for months? What does it do?” Sally asked.

“It’s a mind reading device. It’s supposed to let me read the mind of anyone I look at.” You move your hair to show her the device on your ear. “So you want to help me try it?”

“Sure, why not?” She puts her phone down and sits up. “Thanks for asking instead of just trying it on me without my permission.”

“Yeah, I get that it would be an invasion of your privacy, so I thought I’d ask first.” You reply. “So, you ready?”

“Sure. Tell me what I’m thinking.”

Does it work?
155331221211211121.title: Try it on Sally

1553312212112111211.content:
You press the only button on the device, activating it. ‘It probably won’t work anyway, so what’s the harm.’

“Uh, Sally. It doesn’t help if you’re thinking something obvious like ‘it won’t work’, so try thinking of something else.”

“Oh, okay then.” She looked up, changing her train of thought. ‘Okay, I’ll think of something she can never guess then. Like the fact that Steven and I are secretly dating.’ Your jar dropped. Steven was your brother Jack’s best friend. To think that Sally would date her best friend’s brother is shocking, to say the least. Jack and Steven are both 16, which means Sally is not only dating her younger brother’s best friend, but a minor, which she can get in trouble for.

“Well? Is it working?”

What do you say?
1553312212112111211.title: Yes

1553312212112111212.content:
You press the button on the device that activates it, and wait for it to play your sister’s thoughts. “It doesn’t seem to be working. I can’t hear your thoughts.” You sigh. “Guess I’ve gotta work on it more.” You were about to walk out, but noticed that Sally seemed to be staring at you with a blank expression on her face. Saying nothing. “Hey, you alright?” No response. Now you were starting to get worried. “Say something already!”

“Something already.” She said.

You narrowed your eyes. “Very funny. Anyway, thanks for letting me test it on you.” You stood up, ready to leave the room. “You know, you really should be studying instead of texting. Your grades could be better.” Sally pulled a history textbook out and started reading through it.

You found this very odd. “Wait, your studying now? That was sudden. Why are you studying now?” Still no response. You paused in thought. “Science is more interesting. Study that instead.” Sally switched her history textbook for a science one and started studying it. Now this is really odd. Sally seemed to be listening to you. Even though the two of you are really close, she usually never listens to you when it comes to studying. You decided to try something to see if she’s just messing with you. “Take off your bra.” Sally obeyed, skillfully taking off her bra without taking her shirt off. Too easy. You have to try telling her to do something she’d never do. “Suck on your left tit.” Once again, Sally obeyed, lifting her left breast out of her shirt, without taking her shirt off, and placing her nipple in her mouth, all while continuing to study her science textbook. “Why are you sucking on your tit?” Sally said nothing, still sucking on her tit. “Stop sucking on your tit answer my last question.” She stopped sucking on her tit, but didn’t put it back in her shirt.

“You told me to.” She said in a monotone voice.

Could it be? Could your mind reading device be doing this somehow? “Pick your nose.” She obeyed. “Wipe your snot on your left tit and start sucking it again.” She obeyed, while still studying. Gross. Your sister would definitely never do that, even for a prank. Which means your mind reading device MUST be doing this. Somehow, instead of reading her thoughts and playing them for you, they’re manipulating her mind. This shouldn’t be possible, since mind reading and mind control work very differently, even though both involve signals being sent to or received from the brain. However, even though it’s impossible, it somehow happened. Instead of making a mind reading device like you planned, you made a mind CONTROL device. You smirked, thinking of all the possibilities. You just needed to test one final thing. You press the same button on the device that you pressed before, deactivating it, and Sally suddenly stopped sucking on her tit.

“What the-why am I sucking on my tit?” Sally asked. You quickly pressed the activation button again, putting Sally back into a trance.

“Forget about everything that has happened since I walked in the room.” You smirked again, thinking of all the possibilities. Even though you love Sally, you could use your new device to mess with her. Making minor alterations to her mind, even helping her out a bit by making her more studious. Or you could leave Sally alone, any try controlling other people.
1553312212112111212.title: It does something unexpected

15533122121121112121.content: First thing’s first. You love Sally, so you need to help her out. “From now on, you will spend at least thirty minutes studying before going to bed every day.” With that out of the way, you now you can have some fun with her. You still love her, so you won’t make any big, permanent changes to her. You’ll either just make very small, permanent alterations to her mind in addition to the studying, or just make her do some things she would never do for some laughs, and make her forget about them. You don’t want to embarrass her though, so whatever you make her do, will be where no one else can see. Which are you going to do?

info.brief_description: You've built a body switching machine, and now it's time for a test run.
info.description:
You're a bit of a mad scientist. Not especially popular or attractive with the ladies, you spend your time in the garage fiddling with your science experiments. All of your past accomplishments are nothing, though, because this time you've created a machine that can literally change lives.

The body switching machine is set up in your garage, fairly open for your family to wander into. In addition to its classic two-pod setup, the machine also features a portable core. The core looks like an mp3 player, and can switch two minds by using an apparatus resembling ear buds. This portable core only has enough power for one or two swaps when removed, and can't perform any more until it's placed back inside the main machine and allowed to charge. Additionally, the machine will not function as long as the core is removed.

Update 4/20/2020 I'm trying to clean this story up! If you notice any exceedingly poor quality chapters, or would like to see extra branches added, choices changed out, or any chapters get overhauled, please let me know!


Recurring Characters

Family

Luke; You - You're a social outcast and a bit of a mad scientist. While you've invented a lot of amazing devices, the body switching machine is your masterpiece.



Kyle; Your brother - Though you're not twins, your brother Kyle is very similar to you. He looks a lot like you, but he actively keeps up his appearance. He's a little more popular than you, but not to jock levels. He likes to play with your inventions, and even though it makes you angry, he's just as intelligent as you are, but too lazy to be a scientist like you.

Erika; Your sister - A punk girl, relentlessly trying to rebel against something. Her style might be an attempt to get attention, but your mother is very understanding of a teen's need to be creative and rebellious, so she goes unopposed. She has a bit of a grudge with you, because you tend to use her as a guinea pig for experiments.

Kim; Your mother - A middle school teacher, your mother has always been highly supportive of your scientific pursuits. She's not dumb, but she tends to be ditzy, which plays to her adventurous side.

Mark; Your father - He's supposedly unemployed and a stay-at-home dad, but he always seems to have some kind of business to do. He's an extremely intelligent man, and clearly where you get your brains from. He doesn't approve of your experiments, but allows them to happen because of your mother. He's never shared his mysterious past with you kids, but when he was your age, he also built a body swapping machine, and saw all of the horrible things it could cause.

Kelly Your Aunt- Your father's sister. When she was young and stupid, she signed contracts without reading them thoroughly, and ended up trapped in a world of modeling where she was constantly getting the short end of the stick. Her contracts are due to expire soon, but years of stress have left her emotionally unstable.

Others

Professor Michelle Anderson; Science Rival A 22 year old scientist from the same city. Ever since you came into the science game, she's felt threatened by you. She's bugged your garage, and is always watching from her own secret lab. Sometimes she sabotaged your inventions, other times she'll try and build better versions of the same thing.

Ronald Tramp Famous Billionaire CEO- Ronald Tramp is a famous billionaire who once had his own TV show, "You're Hired!" He wants to turn body swapping into a service that can be sold by his company. He actually seems to be a pretty nice guy, genuinely wanting to help people improve their lives.

Shana White - The confident and cruel 18 year old daughter of local billionaire, Richard White. She is a classmate of your brother Kyle, and attends the same school as you and your siblings. It's unclear why someone so rich is attending a public school. Shana considers herself above everyone. Often attended by her personal maid and bodyguard, Lisabelle, who is the same age.
